name: Soleil Matte Bronzer
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A long-wearing bronzer with a natural matte finish.

What it does:

These long-wearing, rich, matte bronzers are infused with 100% real cocoa powder, offer a buildable payoff and come in shades Milk Chocolate, Chocolate and Dark Chocolate.

name: Shimmering Bronzing Powder
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Give your skin a beach tan with this shimmer bronzing powder.

What it does:

Its complementary shades blend together accentuate your features. Upon application, it brightens your look and provides a unique radiance.

name: Hoola Lite Bronzer
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A lighter shade of Benefit Cosmetic's iconic Hoola matte bronzer.

What it does:

A bronzer formulated for fairer skin tones, Hoola Light joins the award-winning Hoola bronzer. Get a believable sun-kissed look year-round with this natural-looking, soft matte bronzing powder. The finely milled formula blends smoothly and seamlessly and is scented with notes of citrus and sandalwood.

name: Gradient Sunlit Bronzer (Limited Edition)
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A new, limited-edition bronzer to achieve a warm, summer glow all year round.

What it does:

Inspired by the captivating glow of the sun on a beach horizon, this multi-shaded, illuminating bronzer combines Sunlit Bronzer with the beloved Shimmering Skin Perfector® Pressed Highlighter for a naturally radiant, sun-kissed glow.

name: Bronzing Powder
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A bronzing powder in matte finish for a natural sun-kissed glow in a flash.

What it does:

The smooth, sheer texture of this bronzing powder blends perfectly with the skin to give you that natural sun-kissed glow all year long. Its addictive scent will keep you in summer mode all year long. An even, long-lasting tan that doesn't streak is yours for the taking.

name: Soleil Bronzer
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A delectable matte bronzer infused with real cocoa.

What it does:

This Chocolate Soleil Matte Bronzing Powder makes getting glam-and-tan downright delicious. Too Faced combines the natural, therapeutic effects of real cocoa powder with their signature bronzing pigments, creating a unique matte bronzer that neutralises red and evens out all skin tones. The complexion is left with a flawless finish, a gorgeous radiance, and a subtly sweet scent. The ultra-sheer formula is easy to customise, so you will always look naturally irresistible—never orangey. Get glowing, golden goddess!

name: Bronzer
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A bronzer with either a creamy sunkissed finished or darker for contouring.

What it does:

Get a sunkissed glow or sculpted look with a bronzer from RMS Beauty. Buriti Bronzer creates the appearance of glowing, healthy skin with a creamy formula that works on all skin tones and doubles as a luminiser on darker skin tones. Contour Bronzer adds definition to your complexion with a warm, radiant bronze hue perfect for contouring.

name: Glow-Expert Duo Stick
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A two-in-one hybrid stick to sculpt and illuminate.

What it does:

Inspired by the contouring and strobing technique of integrated blending, this dual-sided stick features blush, bronzer, and highlighter, plus a brush, for a perfectly colour-kissed sculpted look. Enriched with glow-reflecting prisms and light-correcting microspheres, it enhances your features and boost radiance.

name: The Ultimate Bronzer
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A buildable bronzer for a sultry glow.

What it does:

TOM FORD introduces The Ultimate Bronzer, an innovative bronzer, formulated with a combination of liquid and powder technology. It glides flawlessly onto the face with a silky, non-drying, and buildable glow. The prismatic, hybrid formula is the most luxurious expression of TOM FORD Soleil, an aerated, bouncy texture in stunning shades with finishes from velvet matte to golden shimmer. The Ultimate Bronzer is part of the TOM FORD Soleil Collection, a sensuous series inspired by remote private islands where summer lasts all year and one day blends seamlessly into the next.

What else you need to know:

This 10-hour formula is oil-free and formulated without talc. It’s encased in an ivory- and gold-coloured compact and embossed with the TOM FORD logo.

name: Bronzing Powder
description:
What it is:

What it is:

An oil-free bronzing powder with a silky, lightweight texture for perfect, natural-looking radiance.

What it does:

Highlight the skin's natural radiance or accent your existing tan Bronzing Powder by TOM FORD. Just brush lightly on cheekbones to define and emphasize your bone structure, or dust all over the face to create the ultimate warm and seductive glow. Bronzing Powder is part of the TOM FORD Soleil Collection, a sensuous series inspired by remote private islands where summer lasts all year and one day blends seamlessly into the next.

name: Sunlit Bronzer
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A bronzer inspired by sun-drenched destinations and days spent at the beach.

What it does:

With a shade for every skin tone, this neutral bronzer creates a healthy, natural-looking warmth for sun-kissed skin. Each beach-inspired bronzer features the iconic Shimmering Skin Perfector® formula by BECCA that’s custom-made with subtle shimmer and blends pigments with liquids to create an unparalleled, creamy feel. The powder’s silky texture lets you customise your glow from subtly sun-kissed to just-stepped-off-the-beach bronze.

name: Ambient Lighting Bronzer
description:
What it is:

What it is:

This bronzer fuses the illuminating effects of Photoluminescent Technology with bronze pigments to deliver a natural, sun-kissed glow while exhibiting depth and dimension.

What it does:

Ambient® Lighting Bronzer is a hybrid product featuring Photoluminescent Technology, the innovation behind the revolutionary Ambient® Lighting Powders. This sheer, airy formula sweeps on softly for a healthy-looking, radiant finish to the skin and to achieve subtle contouring. It can be used alone or paired with Ambient® Lighting Powder for unprecedented control to create depth and dimension. The optically transparent particles allow for seamless blending and colour transitions while the powders create the perfect balance of pigments in a gorgeous natural pattern. No two look alike.

name: Naked Flushed Palette
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A silky bronzer, highlighter, and blush in a sleek, travel-ready compact.

What it does:

Use these pressed powders individually or blend them together to create just the right effect. Urban Decay’s micronized, jet-milled formula has a luxe, featherlight texture that feels amazing on your skin and provides a flawless finish. Light-diffusing particles enhance and perfect for a fresh, glowy look, even after a late night. The colour is intensely pigmented yet blends beautifully, and the universal shades are versatile enough for any skin tone.

name: Amazonian Clay Matte Waterproof Bronzer
description:
What it is:

What it is:

It’s now easier than ever to bronze, contour, and glow with tarte’s bestselling, multi-tasking bronzer.

SIZE: 0.32 oz.

What it does:

It’s formulated to blend and build the perfect level of uniform bronze and create the illusion of an expertly sculpted, slimmer appearance. This all-matte waterproof version adds instant warmth and dimension across a variety of skintones. The Amazonian clay-infused formula helps to improve skin clarity, texture, and tone for an overall lit-from-within complexion.

name: Vitality Glow Anti-Aging Matte Bronzer
description:
What it is:

What it is:

An Anti-Aging, matte, Talc-free bronzer that delivers a face-perfecting vitality glow and airbrush effect. It gives a warmth and radiance to the skin, without settling into lines and wrinkles. It is infused with Anti-Aging technology and skin care treatment for younger looking skin. This bronzer also works well anywhere on the body for a beautiful bronze glow. Developed with leading plastic surgeons, and using Anti-Aging ingredients including Peptides, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Silk, Drops of Light Technology® and Antioxidants, this matte bronzer helps treat skin with Anti-Aging benefits and give a more youthful radiance and vitality-filled glow while completely concealing imperfections, and blurring away the look of pores, fine lines and wrinkles. The universal silky matte shade gives that perfect hint of added vitality glow on all skin tones and types.

What it does:

  • Amazing matte technology for younger looking skin
  • Skin care treatment and bronzer in one product
  • Great on both the face & body

What else you need to know:

Formulated without Talc, Parabens, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Mineral Oil, Petrolatum, Synthetic Fragrance and Phthalates.

name: Radiance Glow Bronzing Veil
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Add natural radiance to your complexion with this bronzer-and-highlighter powder duo.

What it does:

The buildable and blendable bronzer conceals imperfections and blurs away the look of pores, fine lines and wrinkles—all while imparting a natural, sun-kissed warmth with the perfect balance of red and brown tones. Paired with a colour-correcting highlighter, the set also brightens and evens skin tone with an illuminating finish. Made with fine, jet-milled formulas, these powders feel silky smooth and weightless.

name: Bronzer
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A bronzer with either a creamy sunkissed finished or darker for contouring.

What it does:

Get a sunkissed glow or sculpted look with a bronzer from RMS Beauty. Buriti Bronzer creates the appearance of glowing, healthy skin with a creamy formula that works on all skin tones and doubles as a luminiser on darker skin tones. Contour Bronzer adds definition to your complexion with a warm, radiant bronze hue perfect for contouring.

name: Sun Disk Bronze
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Give your skin a sun-kissed appearance with this universal bronzing powder.

What it does:

Its complementary shades blend together to form a sheer tan colour with minimal shine. This huge compact product is sure to last you for a long time.

What else you need to know:

  • Talc-based formula
  • Buildable; smoth and creamy texture
  • Features three complimentary shades in one compact
  • Comes in a stylish casing with a mirror included

name: Balm Desert Blush
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Dive right into theBalm's latest sun-kissed must-have...Balm Desert®.

What it does:

This blush and bronzer is specially formulated to be long-wearing and fade-resistant. Pair Balm Desert with a smokey eye and a colourful lip to really heat things up.

name: O!Mega Bronzer Perfect Tantric
description:
What it is:

What it is:

This super-sized bronzer’s universal Tantric shade gives any skin-tone a natural and flawless glow so effortlessly.

What it does:

It helps to blend the bronzer seamlessly to give a radiant-matte finish.

What else you need to know:

  • Created with micro-fine, Jet-milled powder and advanced pigment technology that allows the bronzer to blend seamlessly onto skin for a radiant-matte finish

name: Betty-Lou Manizer Pressed Powder
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Sweep some powder on your cheeks for a subtle glow. Betty-Lou Manizer comes in a shimmery shade and acts as a shadow or bronzer. Use it to highlight your cheekbones and facial contours. Betty-Lou Manizer contains a creamy texture that glides on. If you desire that youthful radiance, this compact powder does the job. 

What it does:

  • Bronzer and shadow in one
  • Maximum staying power without regular touch-ups
  • Enhances appearance with a subtle glow

name: Bahama Mama Bronzer
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A Caribbean getaway in a compact, this matte bronzer imparts the sun-kissed glow of the tropics, leaving skin looking tanned and fresh off the beach. The best part? It also makes a gorgeous eyeshadow shade and contour powder.

What it does:

Bahama Mama also doubles as the perfect contour powder, neutral brow-filler and matte brown eyeshadow. Yes, this tropical beauty keeps busy!

What else you need to know:

  • Intense pigment.
  • Long lasting wear.
  • Even coverage.

name: Hoola Bronzer
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Hoola Bronzer is a matte bronzer that creates a soft glow or tan without leaving behind shimmer or shine.

What it does:

Sweep Hoola bronzer over your chin, cheeks and forehead to create a warm tan. Or use the natural-bristle cheek brush to contour, chisel and define.

name: Sun Bunny Duo Tone Bronzer
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A dual-shaded bronzer with a subtle pink undertone.

What it does:

The slight pink undertone of this bronzer mimics the colour of a real tan and creates a luminous, sun-kissed finish that is buildable for a customised glow.

name: O!Mega Bronze Coconut Perfect Tan (Limited Edition)
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A universally flattering, seamless matte bronzer, available for a limited time in a glossy white compact with rose gold accents.

What it does:

Back by overwhelming demand, this super-sized bronzer instantly and universally beautifies with the touch of a brush. Micro-fine, jet-milled powder blends effortlessly for a flawless, radiant-matte finish that looks great on all skin tones. The limited-edition glossy white compact with rose gold accents features the same seamless matte formula of O!mega Bronze Perfect Tan in a more neutral bronze shade. Enjoy the delicate scent of coconut fragrance for a vacation vibe.

name: Satin Matte Bronzer
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Alima Pure Satin Matte Bronzer delivers a soft, warm glow that enhances your skin tone. You no longer have to go out into the sun as often to achieve a healthy glow. Warm up your complexion without permanent sun damage with this fine, natural-looking mineral bronzer.

What it does:

It enhances your skin tone and at the same time delivers and soft, warm glow on your face.

What else you need to know:

  • Created with all natural, pure minerals
  • Well-pigmented
  • Prevents clogging of pores
  • Free from parabens, chemicals, gluten, dyes and nanoparticles
  • Cruelty-free

name: Dew the Hoola Soft Matte Liquid Bronzer
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Believe this bronze! A sheer bronzer that gives you a natural bronzed look.

What it does:

This liquid bronzer gives your face a year-round glow without the gleam. The smoothing effects and lightweight texture melt in for a shimmerless, natural look that’s so sheer, it’ll have you saying hoola-la!

What else you need to know:

  • Soft-matte finish
  • Blends seamlessly
  • Signature hoola-la! scent

name: Blush Bar "Cheeks on Pointe" Blush & Bronzer Palette (Limited Edition)
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A “cheeks on pointe” bronzer and blush palette.

What it does:

This limited edition bronzer and blush palette is “tutu” cheeky! Featuring NEW Gold Rushwarm golden-nectar blush, iconic Hoolamatte bronzer, bestselling Dandelion baby-pink powder and more, be sure to grab it while you can! What’s more, it comes complete with Signature Tips & Tricks for you to try new looks that are on pointe!

What it includes:

  • Gold Rush Full-size
  • GALifornia Full-size
  • Hoola Bronzer Full-size
  • Rockateur Full-size
  • Dandelion Full-size
  • Mini Powder Brush

name: Amazonian Clay Waterproof Bronzer - Park Ave Princess (Limited Edition)
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Beloved, best-selling vegan park ave princess™ waterproof bronzer with longwearing Amazonian clay in a remixed, rose gold collector’s-edition compact with a magnetic removable pan.

What it does:

Oil-free, talc-free, Amazonian clay-infused bronzer delivers hours of pigmented wear. The iconic, universally flattering park ave princess™ shade provides an even, buildable glow to enhance any skin tone while balancing your complexion.

name: CC+ Radiance Ombre Bronzer
description:
What it is:

What it is:

It’s your naturally pretty warmth in a compact! This dynamic CC+™ Radiance Ombré Bronzer lets you choose matte glow or subtle radiance all in one!

What it does:

This Anti-Aging formula is perfect for both face and body, with a clinically-shown all day waterproof formula that lasts!
Developed with leading plastic surgeons, this waterproof Anti-Aging colour Correcting Bronzing Veil is formulated with Hydrolyzed Collagen, Peptides and Drops of Light™ Technology, just to name a few good for you ingredients, designed to treat and nourish the skin, while imparting the perfect warm sun kissed glow.

name: Amazonian Clay Bronzer - Park Ave Princess™
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Tarte Mineral Powder Bronzer is an oil-free bronzer that fuses earthly minerals with naturally-derived ingredients for a natural-looking finish.

SIZE: 0.32 oz

What it does:

It contains Skinvigorating™ ingredients like vitamins A and E, which act as antioxidants to fight free radical damage, and it's infused with mineral pigments that are known for their soothing and softening properties.

What else you need to know:

  • Formulated WITHOUT: Parabens, Sulfates, Phthalates
  • This product is also formulated without Synthetic Fragrances, Talc, or Petrochemicals
  • Dermatologist tested

name: The Bronzing Powder
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Achieve a sun-kissed radiance with this bronzing powder.

What it does:

Its fine micronised texture blends with your natural complexion without any lines or the dreaded orange effect.

What else you need to know:

  • Promotes natural look for all complexions
  • Non-comedogenic
  • Paraben-free

name: Sweethearts Bronzer
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Take the guesswork out of creating a sweet, romantic bronzed flush.

What it does:

With two perfect colour swatches in each baked, heart-shaped bronzer, you can just swirl the colours together and sweep on for a healthy-looking glow. The baking process and buildable, blendable colours create dimensional colour to provide the look of brighter, healthier skin.

name: Microsmooth Sculpting
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Achive a more sculpted makeup look with microsmooth scupting.

What it does:

This three-in-one formula effortlessly enhances skintone and give a flawless, no-makeup look and feel. Use all three for seamless, natural-looking radiance.

What else you need to know:

  • Ultra-light, micronized pigments
  • Luminizer for highlighting cheekbones
  • Matte-satin blush to make cheeks pop
  • Matte-satin bronzer to contour and define
  • Free from parabens, sulfates and phthalates

name: Hoola Zero Tanlines Body Bronzer
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Hoola your way to a beachin' bod!

What it does:

It’s your TANtasy come true! This smooth, non-sticky body bronzer glides on HANDS FREE and blends on instantly & seamlessly for a thoroughly believable bronze. Beachin’ bonus…the 12-hour* hoola zero tanlines formula stays on even when your clothes come off.

What else you need to know:

Instant body bronzer * Transfer-resistant & streak-free * Hands-free applicator * Buildable

name: Tea to Tan Face & Body 100ml
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A caramel liqueur spray that gives the skin a sheer bronze to silky amber shade with no hint of streaks or thickness.

What it does:

Infused with black and red tea extracts, this spray moisturises, hydrates and protects the skin for that elegant-looking glowing tan. What’s more, it’s economical to use.

name: Powder Bronzer - Limelight
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A flawless matte bronzer to add a sun-kissed element to your beauty look.

What it does:

Perfect for layering with blushes and highlighters to achieve a natural contour.

name: Cocoa Contour Kit
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Cocoa Contour gives you the power to enhance your most beautiful features and minimize the ones you want to hide in a few simple steps. This curated kit comes with the two essential sculpting shades, the perfect matte highlighter, and a luminous Cocoa Glow for a contoured look that never looks flat. Infused with the antioxidant-rich Exclusive Cocoa Complex, the powders blend seamlessly and indulge you with a decadent chocolate scent. Features a Contour Buki Brush for the most professional sculpting effect.

What it does:

  • Universal set contains all the shades needed to take the guesswork out of contouring, sculpting and highlighting
  • Exclusive Cocoa Complex is a proprietary blend of antioxidant-rich cocoa powder and moisturizing cocoa butter that work together to hydrate and smooth skin and boost your mood.
  • Includes signature Glamour Guide with three contour looks to get you started.
  • Too Faced Co-Founder & Chief Creative Officer Jerrod Blandino was inspired to infuse antioxidant-rich cocoa in makeup while getting a chocolate facial at a Hawaiian spa. He learned of chocolate’s benefits to the skin and included the ingredient in Too Faced’s best-selling products.
  • Shade Descriptions: Cocoa Butter Matte Banana Yellow, Medium Mocha Matte Warm Neutral Brown, Deep Mocha Matte Deep Brown, Cocoa Glow Soft Peach Shimmer

name: Shade & Illuminate Face Palette
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A duet of highlighting and shading creams.

What it does:

This duet of highlighting and shading creams is designed to make sculpting and contouring the face remarkably simple. The super sheer, light shade can be used to draw light onto the skin to brighten and lift the face. The dark shade defines and contours bones while staying invisible to the naked eye.

name: Sun Designer Palette
description:
What it is:

What it is:

An elegant and sparkling palette for sun-kissed radiance on both fair and tan skin tones.

What it does:

Six soft and airy shades in both matte and satin finishes provide a complete collection for contouring and highlighting. Sculpt and brighten with bronzers, blushes, and highlighters in silky, sun-kissed hues that blend seamlessly on all skin types.

name: The Cali Contour Palette
description:
What it is:

What it is:

An easy-to-use, 6-well contour kit pigment-packed with blendable highlighter, bronzer and blush powders.

What it does:

Use these versatile shades to create an effortlessly lifted neutral look or a warm, just cruised-down-the-coast glow. This laid-back makeup palette makes it easy to add warmth and dimension. Customise your signature Cali glow using 6 neutrals which include 2 of Smashbox’s bestselling contour shades.

What it includes:

  • 3 matte + 2 pearlescent powders
  • 1 matte blush

What else you need to know:

  • Cruelty-free

name: Ultra HD Stick Foundation
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A long-lasting, multitasking cover stick with invisible coverage for foundation touch-ups and contouring.

What it does:

This stick creates a flawless complexion on camera, and to the naked eye. Developed specifically for the film and TV industry's most advanced technology, it is completely invisible under the latest, super-focused 4k lens. This revolutionary foundation contains amino acid-coated pigments that provide medium-to-full coverage with a lightweight, second-skin texture that looks just like skin. It leaves a natural-looking, radiant finish, and it’s formulated with hyaluronic spheres for time-released hydration that is perfect for normal to dry skin. Ideal for foundation touch-ups and contouring, it can be applied at home or on-the-go for a flawless complexion.

name: Total Cover Cream Foundation
description:
What it is:

What it is:

An ultra-creamy foundation and concealer in one that provides an all-day radiant finish.

What it does:

Nourishes and protects with anti-aging benefits.

name: Hoola Quickie Cream-to-powder Contour Stick
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A quick-fix contour stick for easy and immediate contouring.

What it does:

Contouring is as easy as 1,2,3 with this soft bronze, cream-to-powder contour stick. Get defined cheekbones, a slimmer-looking nose and a sculpted look with just a few strokes of Hoola Quickie Contour Stick. The dome-shaped tip ensures smooth, targeted application every time.

name: Nudies All Over Face Color Bronze + Glow
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A dewy, skin brightening, bronzer and highlighter for the eyes, cheeks and lips. A custom, made in Korea all-over face colour that softly kisses the skin with a dewy, lightweight and luxurious formula.

1 Nudie All Over Face colour, 0.28 US oz / 8.0g, 1 nudestix sharpener cap and 1 nudestix tin + mirror

What it does:

Hot off the runway, and paired with high fashion or bohemian chic, NUDIES colour stix are dual ended with soft colour balm on one side and a blending brush on the other end for application convenience. Just draw directly on skin, dab softly with fingers or stipple nude colour with brush provided. A custom, made in Korea all-over face colour that softly kisses the skin with a matte or dewy, lightweight and luxurious formula. Draw effortless nude colour all over face for a fresh, natural, youthful ‘no-makeup makeup’ look

name: Contour Intuitive Palette
description:
What it is:

What it is:

An eye and face sculpting palette designed to work every angle of your face.

What it does:

Dare to define and enhance your features in colour with the shades in this gorgeous palette. Featuring six velvety eyeshadows, two pearly highlighters and one blush, each dreamy set of illuminating shades is designed to work every angle of your face. Mix and match any of these highly pigmented and versatile powders for a super-sculpted glow.

name: Cream Contour Spectrum Palette
description:
What it is:

What it is:

An exclusive set of six super-soft, highly blendable contouring and highlighting shades.

What it does:

ZOEVA Cream Contour Spectrum Palette sweeps weightlessly over facial contours to expertly emphasize and define your natural features. On a spectrum from light to dark, the six shades create seamless contours and natural-looking highlight. The matte- and pearl-finish formulas are enriched with nourishing vitamin E to encourage a healthy glow from the inside, out.

What else you need to know:

This product is formulated without parabens, mineral oils, phthalates, and fragrance.

name: Two Tone Contouring Bar
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A bar that provides natural shading and contouring to your skin.

What it does:

This bar gives a little more natural and yet perfect finish. Two Tone Contouring Bar No. 1 Cacao Natural consists of Natural brown and Ash brown shades while Two Tone Contouring Bar No.2 Almond removes redness. It is easy to blend and contour during application.

name: Micro Contour Duo Pencil
description:
What it is:

What it is:

An easy-to-use pencil available in four shade combinations.

What it does:

Think you’ve slayed the sculpted look? Think again—the micro highlighting and contouring trend has arrived! Subtly emphasise your favourite features with the easy-to-use Micro-Contour Duo Pencil. Available in four shade combinations, this slanted, dual-sided pencil allows you to create fine precise lines for a softer effect.

name: Brow & Nose Shadow Powder
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A brow and nose powder that with a built-in brush for easy application.

What it does:

This powder comes in three gradation colours, creating depth and shade for soft and natural brows and a beautiful bridge of your nose. Choose the right tone from four types to suit your hair colour and makeup. Its smooth, non-powdery texture spreads easily and allows lines such as at the end of the eyebrows to be freely drawn. Enjoy long-lasting, beautiful colour, resistant to sweat, lipids and slippage throughout the day.

name: Wonder Stick - Highlight And Contour
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Amplify your look with ghd all-purpose Wonder Stick that has a creamy finish that conceals highlights and contours with ease.

What it does:

It helps to conceal, highlight and contours the face effortlessly.

name: Shade + Light Contour Palette
description:
What it is:

What it is:

An all-matte face contour palette featuring three shades for contouring and three shades for highlighting.

What it does:

Redesigned in a sleek hard-shell case, the Shade + Light Face Contour Refillable Palette features magnetic removable pans so you can refill and customise your dream contour palette. These silky, buildable powders blend effortlessly into the skin for a flawless finish that flatters every skin tone and face shape.

As an expert artist, Kat Von D uses shadow and light to create depth and dimension in her sketches and portraits. She applied the same principles of contrast and gradients to create the bestselling Shade + Light Contour Palette. Unlike traditional bronzing powders, the Shade + Light Contour Palette is loaded with a unique selection of matte shades that capture the true hues of shadow and light. The three contour shades create realistic shadows to recede facial features, while the three highlight shades impart a soft luminosity to amplify dimension, so you can effortlessly sculpt, chisel, shape, and slenderise your features for enhanced definition.

What it includes:

This palette contains: - 3 x 0.16 oz/ 4.5 g Shade powder in Sombre (true taupe), Shadowplay (soft brown), Subconscious (deep brown) - 3 x 0.08 oz/ 2. 25 g Light powder in Lucid (pinkish nude), Lyric (yellow beige), Levitation (soft peach)

What it is formulated WITHOUT: - Parabens - Sulfates - Phthalates

name: Soleil Contouring Compact
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A contouring face palette with blush, highlighter, and bronzer in sheer-to-medium, cream-like powder formulas.

What it does:

Introducing TOM FORD’s sleek, Contouring Compact face palette featuring three sensual summer shades in a Soleil compact with an embossed TOM FORD logo. These cream-like powder formulas seamlessly sweep onto skin with a soft, even finish to add natural-looking dimension and gorgeous colour. The vibrant blush leaves cheeks with the perfect wash of colour, the highlighter mimics the sun reflecting off the skin, and the bronzer enhances healthy-looking radiance.

name: Bronzer
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A bronzer with either a creamy sunkissed finished or darker for contouring.

What it does:

A soft matte liquid foundation with breathable 12-hour long wear, encapsulated in a take-along air-tight compact, perfect for women who are looking for a subtle velvety finish.

What it does:

This liquid foundation’s offers a 3-in-1 formula: High Protection with UV Protection SPF 50+/ PA +++, Lumi-Matte finish with Blur Effect and Silky Velvet Touch.

name: PhotoBalm Powder Foundation
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Introducing Photobalm®, a fabulous-in-a-flash, talc-free powder foundation that is sure to up your selfie game…no filter necessary!

What it does:

This buildable, photo-ready formula is ideal for all skin types. With this level of complexion perfection, you'll be trending in no time!

name: Liquid Silk Foundation 30ml
description:
What it is:

What it is:

This is a must-have foundation.

What it does:

Sheer, buildable, moisturising liquid foundation in a range of 10 flexible shades. Liquid Silk Foundation pairs perfectly with our 10 shades of Cream Concealer for easy matching and traceless, natural-looking coverage. Together, they enhance your skin without hiding it.

Liquid Silk Foundation gives you fresh, smooth coverage that feels like you’re putting on moisturiser. It blends seamlessly with just the right amount of slip, leaving your skin feeling soft, plump and hydrated. Coverage is up to you--go for a fresh, natural-skin finish that shows off your freckles and minimizes pores, or set it with Satin Matte Foundation for full matte coverage.

Find Your Under Tone:

Cool/Neutral: Our Cool/Neutral shades include Pearl, Dream, Suede. These shades are a good match for those with pink undertones rather than golden or yellow undertones. Our 5 Cool/Neutral shades have the broadest range in terms of depth. If you have olive, or neutral brown undertones, you’ll likely find a match here as well.

Warm/Neutral: Our 5 Warm/Neutral shades include Dew, Echo, Spice, Lush. These shades are a good match for those with golden, beige or yellow undertones rather than pink undertones.

Shade Description:

Pearl: For light skin tones with cool or neutral undertones.

You may wear: Satin Matte Foundation in Cool 1, Neutral 1, or Olive 0. Pressed Foundation with Rosehip Antioxidant Complex in Birch.

Dream: For light to medium skin tones with cool or neutral undertones.

You may wear: Satin Matte Foundation in Cool 2, Cool 3, Neutral 2, Neutral 3, Olive 1, or Olive 1.5. Pressed Foundation with Rosehip Antioxidant Complex in Macadamia.

Suede: For medium skin tones with cool or neutral undertones.

You may wear: Satin Matte Foundation in Cool 4, Cool 5, Neutral 3.5, Neutral 4, Olive 2, or Olive 3. Pressed Foundation with Rosehip Antioxidant Complex in Dune*, Malt or Chestnut

Dew: For light skin tones with warm or neutral undertones.

You may wear: Satin Matte Foundation in Warm 1 or Beige 1, Pressed Foundation with Rosehip Antioxidant Complex in Sesame or Aspen.

Echo: For light to medium skin tones with warm or neutral undertones.

You may wear: Satin Matte Foundation in Warm 2, Warm 3, Beige 2 or Beige 3, Pressed Foundation with Rosehip Antioxidant Complex in Nutmeg or Ginger*.

Spice: For medium skin tones with warm or neutral undertones.

You may wear: Satin Matte Foundation in Warm 4, Warm 5, Beige 4 or Beige 5, Pressed Foundation with Rosehip Antioxidant Complex in Cardamom.

Lush: For medium to deep skin tones with warm or neutral undertones.

You may wear: Satin Matte Foundation in Warm 6, Warm 7, Beige 6 or Beige 7, Pressed Foundation with Rosehip Antioxidant Complex in Pecan or Coriander*.

name: Water Blend Foundation
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A lightweight, water-gel, face and body foundation that provides sheer to buildable coverage with a natural-looking, dewy glow and flawless finish.

What it does:

The iconic Face & Body foundation is back and better than ever. Formulated with 80 percent water and enriched with pro-vitamin B5, Water Blend Face & Body Foundation hydrates and improves your skin’s elasticity. The super lightweight formula allows you to customize your foundation result from sheer to buildable, providing your desired coverage level with a fresh, dewy glow. The long lasting, unique water-gel texture applies quickly and easily then sets to ensure that it will not transfer throughout the day. Ideal for all skin types, this foundation is available in an array of 20 shades to match all skintones.

This revamped, modern formula is the next generation of the original and iconic MAKE UP FOR EVER Face + Body Liquid Makeup Foundation. It’s a makeup artist’s must-have makeup to give skin a lightweight, stay-put, flawless finish.

name: Naked Skin - Weightless Ultra Definition Liquid Makeup
description:
What it is:

What it is:

This formula helps skin achieve a natural, illuminated and bright finish— like the beautiful skin you were born with.

What it does:

Naked Skin is formulated with light-diffusing spheres, transforming you to look professionally retouched. Buildable coverage allows women to customize their look.

What else you need to know:

  • Matte and luminous finish, but not flat or shiny
  • Formulated without parabens, sulfates, synthetic fragrances, phthalates, GMOs and triclosan

name: Amazonian Clay 12-Hour Full Coverage Foundation
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Get 12 hours of flawless coverage with this long-wearing, skin-perfecting formula with Amazonian Clay 12-Hour Full Coverage Foundation.

What it does:

It's full-coverage and supremely blendable and buildable formula has a weightless texture and is available in a broad range of shades. Everyone can achieve skin that looks healthy and natural. This foundation intuitively adjusts to meet and address your skin concerns for makeup that wears better, longer, and truer. It also reduces the appearance of pores, discolourations, and imperfections and ensures a perfectly flawless complexion every time.

name: Pressed Foundation with Rosehip Antioxidant Complex 9g
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A lightweight pressed mineral powder with a velvety, matte finish in a refillable compact for easy, on the go application.

What it does:

Pressed Foundation with Rosehip Antioxidant Complex is packed with benefits. Silky rice and mica powders provide smooth, even, buildable coverage. Rosehip Antioxidant Complex soothes, protects, and revitalizes delicate facial skin.

What else you need to know:

  • Rosehip Oil is restorative and healing
  • Evening Primrose Oil is moisturizing and toning
  • Aloe Leaf Extract is soothing and anti-inflammatory
  • Argan Oil is revitalizing and nourishing
  • Calendula and Chamomile Flower Extracts are anti-inflammatory and protective

name: Satin Matte Foundation 6.5g
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Achieve a flawless, blemish-free finish. This foundation lightens fine lines and pores. It contains an oil-free texture that retains your skin’s natural radiance. A hypoallergenic powder, it is safe for use even on acne-prone skin.

What it does:

It lightens fine lines and pores and retains the skin's natural radiance.

What else you need to know:

  • Creates an even and sheer appearance
  • Conceals imperfections without caking the skin
  • Prevents acne breakouts

name: Total Cover Cream Foundation
description:
What it is:

What it is:

An ultra-creamy foundation and concealer in one that provides an all-day radiant finish.

What it does:

Nourishes and protects with anti-aging benefits.

name: Blanc Expert Cushion Compact High Coverage Single Refill
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Lancôme offers a cushion with a unique pigment-charged, patented formula made for the modern day woman.

What it does:

The product protects the face from damage by keeping it hydrated all day. It provides high coverage but remains comfortable on the skin and natural-looking all throughout.

name: Skin Perfection gel
description:
What it is:

What it is:

This modern, multitasking gel-mousse glides on effortlessly to instantly improve skintone, help maintain hydration, and reduce the appearance of redness and discolouration, enlarged pores, fine lines, and shine.

What it does:

Antioxidants, alpha lipoic acid, and vitamins A and E help protect the surface of the skin from free radical damage. Smart colour Technology creates the perfect colour match every time.

What else you need to know:

  • Formulated WITHOUT: Parabens, Sulfates, Phthalates
  • Does not contain oil and fragrances
  • Emollient skin softener leaves a weightless feeling on the skin

name: Cover Cream Foundation
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A thin layer of this innovative, creamy foundation gently melts into the skin for fresh, luminous wear all day.

What it does:

Cover Cream Foundation provides a medium to full coverage and contains SPF 30 to protect your skin from the harmful rays.

What else you need to know:

  • SPF 30/PA++

name: Mineral Foundation Compact
description:
What it is:

What it is:

This silky foundation provides buildable coverage and protects skin with an added SPF.

What it does:

It creates a luminous finish that lasts all day long. Upon application, your skin will feel comfortable and be free from allergy or clogged pores. Use the dual-sided sponge to achieve your desired look – the fuzzy white side for light coverage, or the black spongy side for full coverage.

What else you need to know:

  • Mineral-based pressed powder
  • Contains SPF 10
  • Designed with a lightweight, oil-free texture
  • Comes with a dual sided sponge
  • Free from parabens, fragrances and talc

name: Re(marc)able Full Cover Foundation Concentrate
description:
What it is:

What it is:

An innovative foundation that delivers instant full coverage in a single dot—for less foundation for more coverage that lasts up to 24 hours.

What it does:

Give skin the best in flawless full coverage with this foundation concentrate. This revolutionary formula offers twice as much pigment as a leading full-coverage foundation, but in an oil-free base that blends instantly across the complexion to completely cover pores, blemishes, and other imperfections with the thinnest possible layer that lasts up to 24 hours. All foundations are composed of two parts: pigment and ingredients to carry the pigment to the skin.

Re(marc)able innovates by filling its formula with as much pigment as possible, leaving little room for non-essential ingredients, including water. Not only does it contain twice as much pigment as standard, full-coverage foundations, but these pigments are made of patented golden mica to give the complexion a more radiant, natural-looking glow. The pigments are wrapped in lecithin—an ingredient with a texture that feels similar to skin—to blend effortlessly and meld with the complexion for a smooth, soft-matte finish.

What else you need to know:

Re(Marc)able is inspired by Marc Jacobs's love of a radiant complexion.

  • Coverage: Full
  • Skin Type: Normal, Combination, Oily
  • Finish: Satin, Matte, Radiant, Natural


This product is formulated without parabens, sulfates and phthalates.

name: The POREfessional: Pore Minimizing Makeup Foundation
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A long-wearing, matte makeup that covers without clogging.

What it does:

Target pore problem areas with the POREfessional: pore minimizing makeup by Benefit Cosmetics. This longwearing matte makeup covers imperfections without clogging pores. The weightless formula, made with more-minimising mushroom extract, reduces the look of pores and controls excess surface oil for up to eight hours. Thanks to a custom, built-in pore-blurring sponge, it’s easy to use any time you need a pore-be-gone touchup.

name: Teint Idole Ultra Cushion Foundation
description:
What it is:

What it is:

An oil-free, high-coverage, long-wearing liquid foundation in a portable cushion compact.

What it does:

This ultra-innovative cushion foundation gives you buildable full coverage and refreshing hydration that lasts. Its unique, patented Polar Cushion Technology™ is custom-designed for long-wear coverage. Unlike a sponge cushion, the ultra-absorbent fiber network was specifically crafted to lock in high coverage textures. Its touch-activated filter dispenses the perfect amount of formula with every application. The result is liquid foundation, without leaks or spills. The perfectly portable compact comes with a customized puff applicator for a high-coverage, natural-looking matte finish, making it an easy-to-use, on-the-go makeup. The oil-free liquid formula glides easily and comfortably onto the skin, while delivering a refreshing cooling effect upon application.

What else you need to know:

  • This product is formulated without parabens, sulfates, and phthalates.
  • It is noncomedogenic and is tested under dermatological control for all skin types.

name: Cocoa Powder Foundation
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Leave skin with a flawless, rose-petal finish with this lightweight powder foundation.

What it does:

Too Faced’s unique formula features crystalline powder, which works on all skin types to conceal imperfections and create a soft-focus appearance that doesn’t look heavy or cakey. Infused with an antioxidant-rich, oil-absorbing Exclusive Cocoa Complex, this foundation’s non-drying powder defends against free radicals, minimizes the appearance of fine lines and provides skin with a subtle, chocolatey scent.

What else you need to know:

  • Medium-to-full coverage. 
  • Cocoa Complex hydrates and smoothes with a proprietary blend of cocoa powder and cocoa butter. 
  • Hyaluronic filling spheres diminish the appearance of fine lines and pores. 
  • Crystalline powder brings out skin’s natural radiance. 
  • Paraben-free, sulfate-free and phthalate-free.
  • cruelty-free. 
  • Vegan.

name: 8hr Mattifying Pressed Powder
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Formulated with micronized pigments, this foundation blends into the skin at once. It also refines and evens out your skin tone.

What it does:

Upon application, it creates full and natural-looking coverage. Its unique sponge helps you to apply and touch up precisely for a flawless appearance.

name: Parure Gold - Gold Radiance Foundation SPF 30 - PA+++
description:
What it is:

What it is:

With this latest innovation by Guerlain, dual-faceted gold pigments leave the complexion with a shimmering finish.

What it does:

Gold Radiance Foundation bathes the face in rejuvenating light to boost illumination, reduces darker areas, minimizes the signs of fatigue and revives your complexion. With its featherlight texture, this precious foundation helps skin regain its youthful radiance and vitality day after day.

What else you need to know:

  • SPF 30, PA+++.
  • Contains collagen and elastin boosters to help rebuild the skin’s natural support.
  • Enriched with myrrh oil, an aromatic and revitalizing resin.
  • Paraben-free.

name: Double Wear Stay-In-Place Makeup SPF 10
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A makeup that delivers flawless, 15-hour staying power and natural-looking coverage with no touchups needed.

What it does:

Through heat, humidity and nonstop activity, this lightweight, oil-free formula stays as fresh as when you first applied it and doesn’t change colour.

What else you need to know:

  • SPF 10 / PA++
  • Semi-matte finish.
  • Medium, buildable coverage.
  • Fragrance-free and non-acnegenic.
  • Dermatologist tested.

name: Lingerie De Peau - Natural Perfection Skin-fusion Texture SPF 20
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Get a foundation that fuses to the curves of the face so that imperfections are concealed and skin appears tightened, all in a lightweight fluid formula.

What it does:

Guerlain Lingerie de Peau skin-infusion foundation is formulated with Bio-Fusion micro-mesh, an unprecedented combination of smoothing and shaping fibers that blend to create a comfortable, weightless, perfect finish. The result is a complexion with seemingly transparent coverage and a silky soft, radiant finish.

What else you need to know:

  • Paraben-free.
  • Distinctive and delicate floral scent.
  • Bio-Fusion Micro-mesh contains silk, linen and stretch fibers

name: 10HR Wear Perfection Foundation
description:
What it is:

What it is:

This foundation corrects your skin tone and delivers a natural, flawless finish.

What it does:

It reduces the appearance of wrinkles, blemishes, pigmentation, scars and dark spots. It also protects your skin from sun-caused ageing. Upon application, it blends smoothly to create an invisible texture that feels comfortable all day long.

name: Base Duo Kit 18g
description:
What it is:

What it is:

This kit holds crème foundation and semi-translucent finishing powder in one compact kit. It contains Vitamin E and jojoba oil to moisturise and repair dry skin. Shield your skin from environmental stressors with its added SPF 15. A lightweight texture, it blends to a silky finish. 

What it does:

It creates healthy, luminous glow, smoothens out fine lines on the skin and protects skin from caking or drying out.

name: Double Wear Light Stay-In-Place Makeup SPF 10 / PA++
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Smooth on this oil-controlling foundation for lightweight, smudge-resistant makeup that stays on through heat and humidity.

What it does:

An oil-free makeup, it delivers carefree coverage and keeps skin looking fresh and comfortable throughout the day. Fresh, natural and comfortable, it goes on sheer so that your skin is free to breathe all day long.

What else you need to know:

  • SPF 10 / PA+++
  • 15-hour wear.
  • Sheer-to-medium coverage.
  • Paraben-free, phthalate-free and fragrance-free.
  • Dermatologist tested.
  • Nonacnegenic.

name: Melasleep Brightening Daily Defence Cream(Peach)  40ml
description:
What it is:

What it is:

An enhanced foundation to provide round-the-clock protection of the skin against external contaminated agents. It contains moringa seed extract Purisoft® LS 9602 which forms a protective layer on the skin surface to keep away dust particles. It is rated at SPF 30, with round-the-clock skin protection.

What it does:

In addition, ingredients such as Osmogeline™ reduces damage from the sun and helps to stabilize and protect the skin to reverse photo-aging effects, while Aquaphyline ® forms a long-lasting moisturizing layer to keep skin supple and hydrated.

name: Melasleep Brightening Daily Defence Cream(Rose)  40ml
description:
What it is:

What it is:

An enhanced foundation to provide round-the-clock protection of the skin against external contaminated agents. It contains moringa seed extract Purisoft® LS 9602 which forms a protective layer on the skin surface to keep away dust particles. It is rated at SPF 30, with round-the-clock skin protection.

What it does:

In addition, ingredients such as Osmogeline™ reduces damage from the sun and helps to stabilize and protect the skin to reverse photo-aging effects, while Aquaphyline ® forms a long-lasting moisturizing layer to keep skin supple and hydrated.

name: Blanc De Perle - Essence Infused Foundation 30ml SPF 25
description:
What it is:

What it is:

The power of skincare meets the beauty of makeup in Guerlain Blanc de Perle Essence Infused Foundation. Pure and immaculately white, the pearl shimmers with radiance from deep within.

What it does:

Inspired by this glowing perfection, Guerlain created the first brightening essence-infused foundation with Blanc de Perle. The lightweight and silken formulas evens the skin tone and creates a glowing, pearl-like complexion day after day. Its brightening action is based on a Guerlain whitening innovation, the P.E.A.R.L. complex. Lightweight and freshly scented, a harmonious blend of white flowers, pink peppercorns and mint evoke the immaculate purity of the pearl.

What else you need to know:

  • SPF 25.
  • Protects skin from humidity and UV rays.
  • Long-lasting matte finish.

name: Shameless Foundation
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A medium, buildable foundation with 24-hour wear and flashback-free SPF 25 for a youthful look.

What it does:

This innovative oil-free, weightless foundation is clinically tested for 24-hours of long wear, and contains a first-to-market SPF technology that creates no flashback in photos and no ashy, grey undertones in the formula.

The patented Infinity Milling™ process produces super-fine pigments that result in the most natural-looking, self-setting finish and there’s a broad shade range to suit every skin tone.

Shameless liquid foundation also beautifies from the inside out with skincare benefits, including phenomenal hydration. It contains snow mushroom, which is known for its impressive ability to hold onto water, as well as blue daisy extract, known to visibly diminish the complexion-dulling effects of pollution. Together, they help your skin look hydrated, plumped, and more youthful. Go ahead, show off your skin shamelessly.

name: Photo Filter Powder Foundation
description:
What it is:

What it is:

An eight-hour wear, powder foundation formulated with Light Filter technology and long-lasting photoset polymers that acts as a photo filter for your face.

What it does:

This foundation provides two filter effects in one portable compact. It features a double-sided sponge to create a buildable and customisable, sheer or full finish. The Light Filter Technology acts as a photo filter to leave skin looking flawless: transparent particles diffuse light in various directions, blurring imperfections, evens skin tones and hides redness. Non-drying, non-caking, and non-settling, the particles in this oil-free foundation are translucent so that the pigment’s true colour always comes through. This multitasking formula can also be used as a setting and finishing powder or as base shadow on your eyes. Try layering with Primer Water to lock in customisable coverage that fits your skin’s needs.

What else you need to know:

  • 8-hour colour-true and non-oxidizing wear
  • Custom, buildable coverage goes on smoothly and feels lightweight
  • Doubles as a setting powder for liquid foundation and concealer when used with a brush
  • Oil-free formula helps blot and mattify t-zone
  • Available in a range of skin-perfecting shades
  • Not tested on animals
  • Ingredients subject to change. Refer to packaging

name: Studio Skin 15 Hour Wear Hydrating Foundation
description:
What it is:

What it is:

An oil-free, hydrating foundation was created in Smashbox’s L.A. photo studio to look and feel amazing for 15 hours.

What it does:

Studio Skin 15 Hour Hydrating Foundation is perfect for days when you don’t have time for foundation touch-ups. Get the same high-performance makeup in your own demanding day-to-day life. Light diffusing spheres blur imperfections while makeup stays colour true in any light. This lightweight, blendable formula offers medium-to-full buildable coverage that’s exercise-resistant and sweat- and transfer-proof for a flawless finish.

name: Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation SPF 15
description:
What it is:

What it is:

An oil-free, long-wearing, liquid foundation that delivers medium-to-full coverage and leaves a natural-looking, velvety-matte finish for up to 24 hours.

What it does:

For those long days, this foundation gives you the full coverage, comfortable, long wear that you need. Not thick or greasy, the formula gives all skin tones flawless, complexion-perfecting coverage, while the broad spectrum SPF 15 sunscreen protects against harmful rays. Redness, pores, and imperfections visibly disappear, evening the skin tone and leaving a mattified-yet-natural result. Formulated with colour-true NAI pigments, it maintains your skin’s pH level so that colour stays put all day long—meaning your makeup doesn’t need to be re-touched and provides transfer-resistant coverage—plus, it’s infused with perlite and silica, absorbing oil for a shine-free wear.

name: CliniqueFIT Workout Makeup Broad Spectrum SPF 40 Foundation
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A lightweight foundation with a medium coverage, natural-matte finish that lasts through your workout—and looks great after, too.

What it does:

This oil-free sweat- and humidity-proof foundation keeps up with your highly active lifestyle. Its medium coverage, natural-matte finish wears for 12 long-lasting hours and protects with SPF 40. It’s lightweight so won’t clog your pores or cause breakouts.

name: Total Control Drop Foundation
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A buildable foundation with a velvety finish.

What it does:

From sheer to full, your ideal coverage is just drops away with our new Total Control Drop Foundation! Fine-tune this velvety, matte foundation with the included dropper. Simply adjust the number of drops until you create the look you’re feelin’ today. Want more coverage? Add more drops!

name: Super City Block BB Cushion Compact SPF 50/PA++++
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Highly protective liquid makeup in a convenient compact.

What it does:

Everything your skin needs to face city life, this cushion compact is liquid perfection and protection. The buildable, breathable formula feels cool and weightless on the skin, yet delivers a lasting natural-matte finish. High-level SPF and antioxidants help protect against skin-damaging UV, impurities and environmental aggressors. Perfect for all skin types, it’s ready to go in a compact with a puff applicator.

name: Super City Block BB Cushion Compact SPF 50/PA++++ (Refill)
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A refill of the highly protective liquid makeup in a convenient compact.

What it does:

Keep your cushion compact full of liquid perfection and protection! Everything your skin needs to face city life, Super City Block BB Cusion Compact has a buildable, breathable formula that feels cool and weightless on the skin, yet delivers a lasting natural-matte finish. High-level SPF and antioxidants help protect against skin-damaging UV, impurities and environmental aggressors. Perfect for all skin types, it’s ready to go in a compact with a puff applicator.

name: Everlasting Silk Powder Foundation Crystal Perfection
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Powder foundation that uses a light veil to provide beautiful coverage right down to the pores.

What it does:

This foundation gives a beautiful finish that lasts. Formulated with pore block powder to absorb excess lipids and smooth clear powder that resists dullness even when moistened by lipids, this foundation glides onto the skin while providing close and complete coverage with just a thin yet even film. It leaves your skin looking lustrous and beautifully translucent.

What it includes:

Case sold separately

name: Stay Matte Not Flat Foundation
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Liquid foundation that provides full coverage with a matte finish.

What it does:

This liquid foundation provides full coverage with a mineral enriched matte finish for a wide range of skin tones. The oil-free and water-based formula is perfect for both day and nighttime wear.

name: Shaping Stick Foundation
description:
What it is:

What it is:

What it is:

A double-ended, face-shaping foundation stick with a full-sized foundation on one side and a complementary soft contour shade on the other.

What it does:

This is an all-in-one stick that gives you coverage and sculpting on the quick. The foundation side gives you medium, buildable coverage with smooth blendability and a natural-looking finish. Use the soft contour side for a perfectly coordinated contour shade that adds dimension in seconds, while it shapes and sculpts with an angled tip. Each end delivers lasting coverage that will not settle into pores or fine lines while allowing colour to stay true. Both formulas moisturise the complexion and offer coverage that stays sweat-, humidity-, and water-resistant.

What else you need to know:

This product is formulated without parabens and phthalates, and it is free of sodium lauryl sulfates, oil, fragrance, and alcohol. Find your shade by matching the foundation side to your skin tone (not the contour side).

name: Your Skin But Better CC Cream SPF 50+
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Your one step to full coverage! This highly pigmented, multi-tasking CC cream covers everything, won’t crease or crack and finished with a healthy-looking glow. Developed with leading plastic surgeons, Your Skin But Better protects against both UVA and UVB rays, is bolstered by anti-aging properties and is clinically shown to improve skin texture, brightness and hydration.

What it does:

  • Highly pigmented for complete coverage.
  • SPF 50+ UVA/UVB Broad Spectrum non-chemical sunscreen.
  • Coverage, skincare and protection all-in-one.
  • Brightening and colour-correcting benefits.
     
  • Infused with hyaluronic acid, antioxidants and natural botanicals.

name: Petal Skin Cushion Foundation
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A liquid-to-powder foundation for smooth, younger-looking skin.

What it does:

This liquid-to-powder formula infused with Japanese Sakura duo ingredients gives your complexion a clearer and smoother appearance. The puff applicator creates a poreless matte finish while delicate floral extracts infused within the formula create a youthful and fresh complexion. The new Japanese Sakura duo extracts are added to reduce the look of pores and smoothens the skin.

name: Aqua Glow Cushion Foundation (Refill)
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A refill of the water-enriched Aqua Glow foundation.

What it does:

Keep your glow stocked with a backup of Aqua Glow foundation. Formulated with NARS’ Triple-Force Anti-Pollution Complex and SPF 23, the foundation is your skin’s on-the-go shield against dehydration, pollution, and sun damage. The medium-buildable foundation in Asian-specific shades has a natural cooling sensation that leaves the skin glowing with lightweight moisture and a radiant finish.

name: Natural Radiant Longwear Foundation
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A foundation with up to 16 hours of lightweight, natural, fade-resistant wear, featuring full-powered radiance to smooth the look of skin.

What it does:

NARS’ first 16-hour foundation has a lightweight, breathable, fade-resistant formula and features medium-to-full, buildable coverage in 33 skin-matching shades to fit all skin tones and undertones. The transfer-resistant, sweat-resistant formula stays colour-true all day, and continues to look fresh and vibrant, as if it was just applied. This formula features superior blendability for an imperceptible effect that looks natural, like skin. It doesn’t look or feel cakey, heavy, drying, or masking. A unique combination of translucent base with micronized amino acid-coated pigments and mineral tone-balancing powders mimic skin’s tone, fusing with it for the closest match. NARS’ Skin Optimizing Complex—a blend of raspberry, apple, and watermelon extracts—helps support skin’s elastic fibers to smooth and improve skin’s appearance over time for optimal radiance.

What else you need to know:

This product is formulated without parabens. It is also oil-free, fragrance-free, non-drying, dermatologist-tested, and noncomedogenic.

name: "Un" Cover-Up Concealer + Foundation
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A skin-perfecting concealer and foundation for the under-eye area and face.

What it does:
