A breakthrough liquid-to-powder foundation formula that absorbs oil, camouflages imperfections, and delivers a long-lasting velvet matte finish.

What it does:

This innovative foundation helps reduce the appearance of oil, acne scars, and severe breakouts. It's formulated with Cashmere Kaolinite Clay, which absorbs 75 percent of its weight in oil without over-drying the skin. The oil-free formula transforms instantly from liquid to powder, creating an all-day finish that camouflages imperfections and never appears dull, flat, or cakey. Ultra-fine pigments provide unsurpassed coverage and effectively eliminate the need for powder, blotting, or constant touch-ups throughout the day.

What else you need to know:

This product is formulated without parabens, sulfates, and phthalates. It is good for oily and combination skin types and safe for sensitive skin.

name: Parure Gold - Gold Radiance Powder Foundation SPF 15
description:
What it is:

What it is:

The latest innovation by Guerlain, this powder foundation’s dual-faceted gold pigments produce a shimmering effect to boost radiance and minimize the signs of aging and fatigue.

What it does:

its softness and incomparable glide-on quality embrace the skin with a lightweight touch without emphasizing lines. Naturally smooth and even, the complexion is left illuminated and glowing. Thanks to its elegant black case, it’s easy to carry around and use for on-the-go touchups.

What else you need to know:

  • SPF 15, PA+++.
  • Contains collagen and elastin boosters to help rebuild the skin’s natural support.
  • Enriched with myrrh oil, an aromatic and revitalizing resin.
  • Refillable case.
  • Paraben-free.

name: Hello FAB 3 in 1 Superfruit Color Correcting Cushion
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A weightless, one-step colour-correcting cushion with three universal tints to instantly brighten dullness, decrease redness, and even out tone, while hydrating and refreshing skin.

What it does:

This customisable, cushion compact incorporates blendable colour-correcting pigments that help instantly erase common complexion concerns. Green neutralises redness; Pink helps even skin tone; and Purple helps brighten and reduce dullness. A superfruit extract blend composed of dragon fruit, kiwi, and blueberry extracts help soothe and nourish skin, improve the look of tone and texture, and protect against environmental aggressors. Niacinamide along with beeswax and squalene help promote skin’s bounce, tone, and texture, while softening, hydrating, and smoothing the appearance of skin.

name: Sheer Glow Foundation
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Enhance your complexion without masking. This glowing, radiant-finish foundation delivers sheer, buildable coverage that immaculately evens the skin tone.

What it does:

Complete with skincare benefits and brightening properties, it leaves skin hydrated, softer and smoother. Used daily, Sheer Glow Foundation improves the skin's brightness and texture.

What else you need to know:

  • Suitable for normal, normal-to-dry, dry and very dry skin
  • NARS Complexion Brightening Formula hydrates and illuminates.

name: Lock-It Liquid Foundation
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A hyper-performance liquid foundation with flexible full coverage and 24-hour wear, in 30 shades for a range of skin tones and undertones.

What it does:

Lock-It Foundation gives you all the coverage you need to rock a flawless matte-not-flat canvas that stays waterproof, fade-proof, and transfer-resistant for 24 hours, no touch-ups necessary. This unique formula delivers flexible full coverage—all you have to do is adjust the amount of foundation you use to quickly and easily achieve your perfect finish, whether it’s natural medium-to-full coverage, or a flawless full-coverage finish.

With a high-pigment foundation such as Lock-It, a little goes a long way. Just 1 pea-size droplet provides natural medium-to-full coverage with 24-hour wear. Need to cover redness, blemishes or discoloration? Simply add another droplet and build lightly to create a flawless full-coverage finish. For perfect precision and seamless blending, apply with the Lock-It Edge Foundation Brush.

Think you know Lock-It Foundation? Think again. Kat Von D’s hyper-performance vegan foundation has been a top-selling foundation for 6 years and counting—and it’s only getting better.

What else you need to know:

  • Kat Von D used an antique wax seal as the inspiration for the Lock-It Collection design.
  • Oil-free and Alcohol-free

name: Teint Infusion Ethereal Natural Finish Foundation
description:
What it is:

What it is:

The ultra-fluid texture of this formula flawlessly melts onto skin for buildable light-to-medium coverage and the feeling of wearing no foundation at all.

What it does:

The formula glides on for foolproof application and moisturizes to create visibly smoother skin.

What else you need to know:

  • Ultra fluid texture
  • Buildable coverage
  • Moisturising formula

name: Lock-it Powder Foundation
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A 24-hour powder foundation with a flawless, matte finish.

What it does:

Day or night and everything in between, this budge-proof foundation promises flawless coverage around the clock. The buildable formula evens the complexion and hides imperfections—all without the need for touch-ups. Smudge- and sweat-proof, this foundation won’t cake or crease and the velvety texture wears with a breathable, light touch.

What else you need to know:

This product is completely vegan, free of animal-derived ingredients and is formulated without parabens, mineral oil, paraffin, and fragrance.

name: Hello Flawless! Oxygen Wow Liquid Foundation
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Achieve that natural flawless look with this new oil-free liquid foundation. With its brightening formula, your skin radiates with a healthy-looking glow.

What it does:

A brightening oil-free liquid foundation for a natural, luminous finish.

What else you need to know:

  • Oil-free

name: Cover Click
description:
What it is:

What it is:

The best-selling Cover FX Total Cover Cream Foundation is now available in an ultra-creamy and convenient stick version. A foundation and concealer in one, it’s perfect for contouring, highlighting, concealing and covering. Available in dozens of universal shades, this cult favorite offers ultimate blendability and mimics the look of natural skin.

What it does:

  • Paraben-free and sulfate-free.
  • Fragrance-free and talc-free.
  • Vegan.

name: Age Repair Perfect Canvas
description:
What it is:

What it is:

An advanced complexion-perfecting treatment foundation.

What it does:

Age Repair Perfect Canvas redefines your complexion by intensely hydrating and condition skin for an airbrushed finish. The ultra-lightweight and innovative colour-adjusting formula is made with optical diffusing pigments that smooth and blur the appearance of fines lines, open pores and uneven skin tone. It’s enriched with advanced anti-aging ingredients like Suberlift™, a botanical that instantly smooths and lifts, and nyamplung oil, which stimulates cell repair and protects against free-radical damage.

name: Cover-Expert SPF 15 - Perfecting Fluid Foundation Ultra- Correcting Coverage (35ml)
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A high-performance colour-correcting foundation that blurs away imperfections.

What it does:

With futuristic Intensive Mimetic Camouflage technology, the multi-active ultra-lifting foundation auto adjusts to the your skin colour to unify your complexion with a natural-looking velvety finish. Microcapsules of pure mimetic pigments blend naturally with skin’s texture to unify, while a high concentration of soft-focus pigments offer seamless, even coverage. Its smoothing, matte-texture formula is enriched with hyaluronic acid, regenerative ingredients, and sun protection benefits

name: Terrybly Densiliss Wrinkle Control Serum Foundation
description:
What it is:

What it is:

An ultra-smoothening wrinkle control serum foundation.

What it does:

This is the first wrinkle control and firming serum foundation scientifically proven and approved to improve skin density, diminish lines and simultaneously treat all signs of ageing. Terrybly Densiliss® combines a revolutionary patented rejuvenating active ingredient with an optimal makeup correction that immediately targets surface wrinkles and provides deep-down and lasting global results.

name: Illusion Hyaluronic Skin Tint
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A medium-to-full coverage foundation that smooths the look of fine lines, wrinkles, and sagging skin and delivers a radiant glow.

What it does:

Illusion® Hyaluronic Skin Tint is a hydrating and firming foundation that evens out the skin tone, softens imperfections, and boosts moisture levels in the skin. It is formulated with Hourglass’ Hyaluronan Complex, an advanced form of hyaluronic acid that plumps while filling in deep wrinkles. Pearlescent pigments infuse the complexion with a luminous glow. The whipped formula's creamy texture creates medium-to-full coverage while providing broad spectrum SPF 15 sun protection.

name: Veil Fluid Makeup
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A concentrated treatment foundation with remarkable short- and long-term benefits. Powered by Matrix Regeneration Complex, an Hourglass proprietary compound, Veil Fluid Makeup targets the signs of aging by helping alleviate the appearance of wrinkles over time, and creates a natural radiant complexion. UVA/UVB SPF 15 helps protect skin from the sun.

Available in 11 shades:
* Porcelain - very fair with yellow undertones * Ivory - light/medium with yellow undertones * Nude - light/medium with yellow to neutral undertones * Light Beige - medium with neutral to pink undertones * Sand - medium with neutral to yellow undertones * Honey - tan to deep tan with yellow undertones * Beige - medium tan with neutral to yellow undertones * Warm Beige - tan with neutral to yellow undertones * Sable - deep tan with neutral undertones * Chestnut - very deep with neutral undertones * Walnut - very deep with neutral to red undertones

What it does:

  • An oil-free and long-wearing treatment foundation that helps counter the signs of aging.
  • Matrix Regeneration Complex stimulates the skin matrix by addressing collagen production.
  • This advanced, serum-like formula is equivalent to an extension of your skincare regimen.

name: CC Crème 45ml
description:
What it is:

What it is:

The secret of Korean skin perfection, this high-definition skin-perfecting CC cream’s formula features encapsulated pigments that’s self-adjust to your skin tone for a flawless-looking complexion and even coverage.

What it does:

Enriched with centella asiatica, it boosts radiance while helping to hydrate skin and protect from harmful UVA/UVB rays. It’s lightweight coverage helps skin appear refined, soft and healthy-looking.

name: The Lightbulb UV Compact (Refill)
description:
What it is:

What it is:

When higher coverage tends to produce a powdery finish, this compact foundation keeps it natural.

What it does:

Be empowered to polish up your glow and flaunt a flawless complexion so you can feel radiantly comfortable in your own skin.

What else you need to know:

  • Gives high coverage and one film smooth finish without a powdery appearance
  • Has SPF 30, PA+++
  • Suitable for all skin types and non-comedogenic

name: Hello Flawless! Powder Foundation
description:
What it is:

What it is:

This powder foundation contains a silky formula that glides on smoothly on your skin. Apply a single layer for a naturally sheer look, or layer on for customised coverage.

What it does:

It creates a naturally sheer look on the skin and upon application it leavs a silky and velvety finish that offers a medium to full coverage.

What else you need to know:

  • Velvety formula that glides on smoothly
  • Offers medium to full coverage
  • Comes in a compact with sponge and brush

name: Meteorites Baby Glow - Light-revealing Sheer Make-up 30ml
description:
What it is:

What it is:

For the first time, light has become liquid in the alchemy of Meteorites Baby Glow sheer foundation.

What it does:

The silky, luminous formula restores skin’s radiance and minimizes signs of fatigue as it unifies, smoothes, refreshes and plumps the appearance of skin. Baby Glow creates a natural-looking finish and evens skin tone without thickness, providing a mask effect that leaves the skin feeling softer, smoother and fresher. Formulated with rainbow-perfecting technology, it’s infused with prismatic pearl pigments in red, blue, green and gold shades that blend onto the skin to subtly correct and revive the complexion. The result is a face that appears more rested and more radiant. It leaves behind the legendary scent of Meteorites—delicate, ultra-addictive violet.

What else you need to know:

  • SPF 25.
  • Feather-light texture.
  • Paraben-free.

name: BB Crème 45ml
description:
What it is:

What it is:

BB Crème by Erborian is a true secret of Korean skin perfection.

What it does:

The 5-in-1 formula of highly concentrated herbs used over the ages in Asia leaves skin velvety, soft and spotless. It unifies skin tone to conceal imperfections, moisturises, nourishes and leaves skin feeling like velvet. Infused with ginseng, it has stimulating, toning and revitalising properites.

name: Double Wear Nude Cushion Stick Radiant Makeup
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Touch on, buff, and blend to your perfect nude. Double Wear Nude Cushion Stick Radiant Makeup polishes and evens skin tone with a skin-loving, weightless and comfortable formula that instantly hydrates.

What it does:

The new Double Wear formula comes in an innovative stick that combines liquid makeup and a pro-grade applicator in one. Skin is left with a radiant glow that lasts all day.

What else you need to know:

  • 8-hour wear.
  • Weightless texture.
  • In shades for all skin tones.

name: Double Wear Cushion BB - All Day Wear Liquid Compact SPF 50 / PA+++ (Refill)
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A refill for your Double Wear Cushion BB compact.

What it does:

Running low on your Double Wear Cushion BB? Refill your compact and keep the lightweight, comfortable coverage coming. This all-day cushion BB provides moisture while minimising the appearance of pores, fine lines, and imperfections. The oil-free formula is water-resistant and protections skin from harmful sun damage. Skin is left looking and feeling smooth and hydrated.

What else you need to know:

Includes cushion makeup pan and sponge applicator.

name: Tinted Moisture Cushion CC
description:
What it is:

What it is:

3CE Tinted Moisture Cushion CC contains a hydrating complex to create a moisture layer for dewy radiance.

What it does:

When you need a touchup, add a moisturising layer of Cushion CC instead of skin-drying foundation to restore skin and keep makeup perfectly in place. A range of natural tones and buildable coverage create a flawless finish for all skin tones and types.

name: All Nighter - Liquid Foundation
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A full-coverage, matte-finish, waterproof foundation that lasts all night.

What it does:

All Nighter Liquid Foundation by Urban Decay provides full coverage with a modern matte finish that never looks overdone. Get all-night wear and a blown-out effect you never thought was possible for a flawless complexion that looks amazing and stays that way. Perfect for all-night affairs, this innovative formula is also comfortable enough to wear every day. Completely matte and oil-free, this formula is loaded with an higher amount of pigment, so a little goes a long way. There’s no need to build coverage or apply multiple layers. This waterproof formula diffuses light to blur flaws for beautifully perfected skin, while it mattifies and absorbs oil to reduce the appearance of shine.

name: Fitting Cushion Foundation
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Keep your face fresh with a cushion compact foundation that helps prevent dark spots and discolouration.

What it does:

The lightweight formula adheres to skin instantly while providing excellent coverage just like a liquid foundation, but with the added hydration benefits of a cushion. Fitting Cushion Foundation assists with brightening, reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles and provides UV protection all in a portable compact.

name: Artist Color Shadow Refill
description:
What it is:

What it is:

28 intense shades in a choice of five highly blendable finishes

What it does:

Select your favourite colours to create your own customised palette. The shades are available in five different finishes: matte, metallic, diamond, satin and iridescent. They are highly blendability and deliver an immediate payoff that lasts up to 12 hours.

name: Rose Gold Palette
description:
What it is:

What it is:

An eye shadow palette consisting of 18 unique shades that bring back the Rose Gold trend.

What it does:

We are bringing back the Rose Gold trend. Rose Gold Remastered is a transformed, redesigned version of the original Rose Gold Textured Shadows palette. This harmonious colour range of 18 unique unified shades featuring four textures (mattes, metallics, pressed pearls and one wet&dry shadow) makes it a cinch to create a vast array of looks. The shadows are highly pigmented and so easy to pick up and blend with a brush that you only need to apply lightly. End with a metallic shadow for a shiny foil finish. It's like metal fondant for your lids. With some colours adjusted to create a softer colour harmony, this palette is perfect for day or night.

What else you need to know:

  • New palette features a mirror, for makeup application on-the-go
  • Please note that the formulation of the shadows are very delicate and soft in texture

name: Multistick
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A contour for the eyes, lips and cheeks.

What it does:

This handy multistick is the ultimate in efficiency on the go as you can use the same stick to contour the eyes, cheeks and lips.

name: Star Lit Powder
description:
What it is:

What it is:

This shimmering, silky powder catches the light and gives skin a unique glow.

What it does:

Star Power by Make Up For Ever combines an extremely fine yet dense texture. Only a small amount is necessary for a visible and fabulous result. Each shade contains exclusive, highly reflective pearls that light up the skin with a radiant glow. Wear wet or dry for natural-looking to intense effects.

name: Diamond Powder
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Radiate a pearly luminosity with this powder that can be applied to the eyes, cheeks, lips and body.

What it does:

This ultra-fine powder delivers a bright, shimmering finish which in effect, gives you an overall vivid aura. Also, the delicate and fine particles don’t feel lumpy or rough on the skin.

name: Colorful Eyeshadow
description:
What it is:

What it is:

This eyeshadow delivers excellent colour payoff for up to 10 hours.

What it does:

Its unique formula allows you to apply the shadows easily. Upon application, you'll find that it leaves a smooth and blendable texture. As an added benefit, it provides antioxidant protection from pollution and sun-caused ageing.

name: Aqua Matic Eyeshadow
description:
What it is:

What it is:

This easy-to-use eyeshadow produces effortlessly beautiful results thanks to the texture which blends so smoothly across the eyelid.

With highly-pigmented colours and a waterproof quality, this Allure Best of Beauty winner delivers intense colour payoff sans the smudging and transferring so you can add colour and character to your eyes

What it does:

It has a retractable twist-up mechanism for quick and fool-proof application, and comes with a sharpener for convenient touchups and it is formulated with silica for a blendable texture for easy application.

name: Pressed Eyeshadow Refill
description:
What it is:

What it is:

With infinite colour choices to fit your personality, dare to experiment with your look and evolve your style.

What it does:

Create a multi-dimensional illusion with this eyeshadow refill that have powders that capture light and reflect it beautifully.

What else you need to know:

  • Formulated with true colour payoff for a non-fading finish
  • Blends easily for ideal coverage and control

name: Quickliner For Eyes Intense
description:
What it is:

What it is:

No need to be subtle when it's now so easy to move into the deepest, most dramatic range. Find all the intensity of a liquid liner in one simple stroke. Silky formula glides on. Stays on all day. Never needs sharpening. 'Smoke' with the smudge tip on the opposite end. Ophthalmologist Tested.

What it does:

Two great ways to wear it: * Create a dramatic winged-eye look. * Use it as a long-lasting eyeshadow.

name: Complete Eye Palette
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A four-shade eye palette with a luminizing base to highlight, two buildable colours to add shape, and an intense liner to define.

What it does:

This eyeshadow palette allows you to effortlessly create multiple eye looks. Silky smooth, ultra-blendable, and layerable textures enhance, highlight, and define the eyes. Inspired by the hues in Burberry’s runway collection, these highly-pigmented eye colours enrich the skin, leaving a lasting vibrant finish—all packaged in a travel-friendly pouch with three eye brushes.

What else you need to know:

  • Silky smooth, ultra blendable and layerable powder texture

description:
What it is:

What it is:

A collection of creamy PRO eyeshadow singles in a range of high-impact metallics.

What it does:

Shadow pans can pop-out to save in any magnetic palette!

name: Ecrin 1 Couleur - Long-lasting Eyeshadow Silky Powder
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A single eye colour for everyday wear in two finishes.

What it does:

Long-lasting Eyeshadow Silky Powder by Gueralin reinvents a beauty essential. Choose your finish, matte or metallic, among a range of equally seductive and indispensable shades. Each shade incorporates Guerlain’s signature Lastever Technology, featuring gel-coated pigments that stay put throughout the day without settling into creases or fine lines. Your colour remains fresh and beautiful all day, as if just applied.

name: Alchemist Holographic Palette - Face & Eye Highlighter Palette
description:
What it is:

What it is:

An eye, lip, and face transformer palette with four holographic shades.

What it does:

Revamp your makeup looks with the Alchemist Holographic Palette inspired by the ancient science of Alchemy, the art of transforming natural materials into something precious. This palette includes four tranformative holographic shades perfect for achieving a spectrum of radiant special effects when layered over eyeshadows or lipsticks. Formulated with Double Dimension Technology, this first-of-its-kind formula is packed with 360° refractive pearls, dipped in a prismatic coating. Each shade catches the light from every angle for a spectrum of luminising effects to customising finishes and experiment with your artistic expression.

The hybrid formula also doubles as a super-shimmery highlighter. Simply sweep product over prepped skin for otherworldly iridescence. Because the formula is packed with high-quality, pearlescent particles, a little goes a long way—even a subtle application imparts bold impact.

What it includes:

Holographic Shades (0.05 oz/ 1.53 g each) in Emerald (green), Saphyre (blue), Amethyst (ultra-violet), and Opal (pink).

What else you need to know:

This product is vegan, completely free of animal-derived ingredients, and it is formulated without parabens, sulfates, and phthalates.

name: Eyes To Kill Eye Tint
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A long-lasting, tinted formula with the comfort and smoothness of a cream for intense, vibrant eye looks.

What it does:

This innovative formula transforms from liquid to solid, instantly adhering to the eyelid while providing 16 hours of smudge- and crease-proof wear. Formulated with a hold booster, a creamy polymer with glycerine that allows pure colour pigments to blend together seamlessly and stay on lids, this tint is infused with a colour vibrancy booster, which is enriched with natural pigments and pearls. This unique complex works together to evenly disperse high-density colour. Each dynamic runway-inspired shades can be used as an eyeshadow or eyeliner or layered together for natural to glamorous looks.

name: Chrome Paint Shadow Pot
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Your secret to a high-gleam gaze & the richest, most vibrant eyeshadow you’ve ever seen – the mirror-effect pressed pigment melts instantly & stays put for hours.

What it does:

Dazzles with a spectacular mirrored metallic effect that has the high sheen of a cream or gloss but the easy wear & application of a powder, with over 80% pure pearl pigments. It’s as easy to use as finger paints – no brushes necessary! The warmth of your fingers makes the formula to melt into skin without a need for primer.

tarteist™ tip: try layering your favorite powder eyeshadows on top of this longwearing formula – it’ll make your look pop & last all night.

name: Colorful Eyeshadow Mono
description:
What it is:

From nude to vibrant and matte to iridescent, you'll be able to make your own combinations and create custom looks to match your style and last for up to 10 hours.

What it is:

An everyday to night palette with fourteen shades, including essential mattes and glam shimmer.

What it does:

These 14 full-pigment and easy-to-blend shades glide on with the supplied double-ended brush to deliver ultra-matte and shimmer finishes. Create softly glamorous looks any time with the combo of ultra-matte, duo chrome and metallic shades that are fully pigmented and easy to blend.   • Rose Pink (rose gold with a soft pink iridescent hue)
  • Sultry (a hybrid satin metallic finish warm chocolate brown)
  • Bronze (metallic gold bronze)
  • Mulberry (ultra-matte mulberry)
  • Dusty Rose (ultra-matte dusty lilac)
  • Fairy (multi-dimensional light gold)
  • Burnt Orange (ultra-matte deep orange)
  • Sienna (ultra-matte earthy brown)
  • Rustic (ultra-matte deep cinnamon brown)
  • Cypress Umber (ultra-matte dark coffee)
  • Noir (ultra-matte deep carbon black)

description:
What it is:

What it is:

A two-tiered eye palette with two coveted formulas to create a lustrous and seductive eye.

What it does:

The Cream and Powder Eye colour features two hues for warm-weather looks. The ultra-pigmented, metallic cream shadow glides on with a rich, molten glow while the sparkling celestial powder intensifies your eyes with alluring shimmer. What it includes:

  • Base Eye Colour (6g).
  • Eye Colour (2g).

name: Divine Eyeshadow Palette (Limited Edition)
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A new, limited-edition eyeshadow palette with 8 high-pigment matte, shimmer and metallic shades inspired by the drag queen Divine’s iconic look.

What it does:

The Kat Von D x Divine Eyeshadow Palette was designed to power your self-expression with eyeshadows that range from girlish to glitzy. Each shade was named in honour of Divine’s most famous performances, on and off the silver screen. These cushiony shades are blendable and buildable, in Kat Von D’s signature high-performance eyeshadow formula, for next-level eye looks that deliver major impact. From a metallic neon green to a shimmering navy, this eight-pan palette has every shade you need to colour, create and celebrate your boldest self.

What it includes:

Eyeshadow shades in: * Babs (Champagne with Blue-Green Shimmer) * Hard Magic (Matte Jet Black) * Baltimore (Cobalt with Blue-Purple Glimmer) * Waters (Matte Sky Blue) * Filthy (Metallic Gunmetal) * Pink Flamingos (Pearlescent Lime Green) * Female Trouble (Matte Pure White) * Hairspray (Metallic Pewter with Silver and Gold Glimmer)

name: Miniature Eyeshadow Palette
description:
What it is:

What it is:

The perfect size for on-the-go use, this must-have palette includes universal and easy-to-wear shades plus a tutorial for creating sensational looks. The soft, neutral shades range from pinks and golds to smoky neutrals to suit any occasion, day or night.

name: Aristo Eyeshadow Palette
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A curated selection of highly pigmented, ultra-rich shades inspired by Mother Nature.

What it does:

A feast for the senses, Aristo Eyeshadow Palette depicts a plentiful harvest with a cornucopia of easy-to-blend hues, channeling the power of the elements—from earthy browns, airy nude, and fiery terracotta red to aquatic teal blue and grain-coloured yellow—vital for creating lavish, bounteous makeup looks.

What it is:

What it is:

A limited edition eyeshadow palette featuring 7 brand new shades in 3 versatile finishes – creamy matte, metallic and twinkling topper.

What it does:

Inspired by the mesmerising, multi-faceted colours of an abalone shell and lustrous jewels of the ocean, each shade can be effortlessly layered to create a range of beachy, otherworldly eye looks. The velvety smooth, ultra-blendable texture glides on for rich colour payoff and easy application.

What it includes:

  • Seashell (Matte) – A neutral ivory beige
  • Abalone (Metallic) – A soft duo-chrome purple

description:

A finely-milled, highly pigment, eyeshadow formula in eight finishes: titanium, duo-chrome, ultra-matte, metallic, satin, shimmer, sparkle, and velvet.

In just three easy steps, you'll be on your way to building your own custom Anastasia Beverly Hills plette and receiving a free Empty 4 Well Refillable Eye Palette with the purchase of four individual Eyeshadows! Create a custom palette with the Empty 4 Well Refillable Eye Palette that holds four pans of your favourite colours and textures.

name: Eye-Conic Multi-Finish Eyeshadow Palette
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A long-wearing eyeshadow palette that features seven shades, including four fashion finishes, velvet, satin, silk, and lamé—to layer and dress your eyes.

What it does:

Empower your inner eye stylist with these ultra-luxe eyeshadow palettes, each featuring four fashion finishes: buttery matte velvet, shimmering satin, sparkling silk, and metallic lamé. Beyond his fashion design, Marc Jacobs is also known as “the ultimate stylist” for making last-minute adjustments to perfect every look right before it walks down the runway. Each curated palette includes a covetable mix of chic neutral, wearable shades, and provocative pops in a new super-plush shadow formulation to cover lids in lasting, velvety-rich pigment. Available in six different colourways, choose the wardrobe that speaks to you, then layer it on to make the ultimate impression.

What it includes:

The set contains: 7 x 0.003 oz/ 0.08 g eyeshadows

What else you need to know:

Beyond his fashion design, Marc Jacobs is also known as “the ultimate stylist” for making last-minute adjustments to perfect every look right before it walks down the runway. The eyeshadows in each Eye-Conic palette are inspired by textiles and layering, and come in four fashion finishes so you can be the ultimate stylist too. Finish your look and let it stand out by layering a bright colour or lamé pop on top. Read the shade names from left to right for a short poem. The slim, seven-shadow palette was designed to feature the oblong infinity mirror and was inspired by the rear-view mirror of an automobile.

Each palette features its own shade personality:
* Provocouture (dusty plum and magenta): Say it with style; otherwise, you might as well just stay in bed.
* Glambition (bare and bronze): She was infamous, known for seeking the most over-the-top glamour.
* Frivoluxe (chilled greige and violet): Fabulous! Always dress outrageously and how you want. Who has time for less?
* Scandalust (rust and warmed browns with scarlet): Hot pants at the office cause a fuss; that’s why they call her Little Miss Scandalous.
* Edgitorial (camouflage and reflective gold): Take a memo. Next season, we’ll see, pleather python, making a scene, enviously, everywhere.
* Smartorial (celestial cobalt and icy teal with prismatic gray): Whenever in doubt: power platforms. Make sure (for once) they know who runs the show.

  • This product is formulated without parabens, sulfates and phthalates

What it does:

This epic eyeshadow palette will inspire you to be your boldest self. In honour of this milestone, Kat hand-picked a special selection of shades inspired by and named after 16 of her muses—people of all backgrounds, ages, genders and skin tones, representing the many faces of Kat Von D Beauty. This rainbow-bright selection of shades and finishes is designed to power your self-expression with insane pigment and effortless blendability.

What else you need to know:

  • Vegan
  • Cruelty-free

name: Opulence Eyeshadow Palette
description:
What it is:

What it is:

An eyeshadow palette packed with 10 highly pigmented shades for dramatic looks that last.

What it does:

The Opulence Eyeshadow Palette by ZOEVA balances extravagance and elegance with a lavish arrangement of plush colours. Sparked by the rich hues and dramatic shades of moody still life paintings, the palette transforms the beautiful essence of a blooming bouquet into ten highly pigmented eyeshadows. From rosy copper over hues of ivory dahlias to vibrant royal blue orchids, the palette features the perfect shades and finishes to create a true makeup masterpiece.

What else you need to know:

These eyeshadows are formulated without parabens, mineral oils, fragrances, and phthalates.

name: One Color Shadow - Shimmer
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Add pearlescent shimmer and vivid colour to your eyes with this highly pigmented, velvety-soft eyeshadow.

What it does:

With its soft, suede-like texture, this eyeshadow provides a gentle shimmer against your lids while keeping your look soft and lustrous.

What else you need to know:

  • Suitable for all skin types.

name: One Color Shadow - Luster
description:
What it is:

What it is:

The One colour Shadow - Luster series consists of eight stunning eyeshadow shades that give the eyes a natural shimmer.

What it does:

This product features a soft and dewy texture for easy application. Use one colour alone or blend together two to three different shades, and get the alluring eyes you’ve always wanted.

What else you need to know:

  • Suitable for all skin types.

name: Lip Pigment
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A lip pigment that saturate your lips in vivid, high-impact colour.

What it does:

  • These 3 Concept Eyes Lip Pigments can be worn alone, mixed together or mixed with powders to create a customized blush or eyeshadow!
  • Just one drop is all you need for smooth, even, punchy colour.

name: Eye Tint
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A semi-sheer, blendable & crease-resistant crème eyeshadow.

Size: 0.24 oz

What it does:

This long-wearing, crease-resistant eye tint beautifully complements your look, building a streak-free finish from semi-sheer to deep and dramatic. Easily apply the smooth formula with fingertips or a brush, either alone or layered with complementary shadows for added intensity.

name: Glam Cream Shadow
description:
What it is:

What it is:

The Glam Cream Shadow is an all-day long cream eyeshadow with shimmering pearl particles within a creamy texture.

What it does:

It comes in different weak colour shades that will still leave a natural tone for your skin. It’s great eyeshadow makeup that will not smudge and you can even blend two colours to create your own shade.

What else you need to know:

  •  The cream shadow can applied as a base.
  •  It can be applied safely on the corner of the eyes or on the inner corner of the eyes for highlighting without the irritation.
  •  You can blend two colours or use one colour for a natural look.
  •  It will not smudge and will last virtually the whole day.

name: Nudies All Over Face Color Matte
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A dual-ended stick with a long-wearing, matte, monochromatic nude colour and a brush for the eyes, cheeks, and lips.

What it does:

Straight off of the runway, and paired with high fashion or bohemian chic, these water-resistant sticks are dual-ended with a soft colour balm on one side and a blending brush on the other end for convenient application. Just draw it directly on skin, dab softly with fingers, or stipple on nude colour with the brush. It achieves non-feather, all-over face colour for a soft look with a matte or dewy, lightweight finish.

name: Be A Mermaid & Make Waves Eyeshadow Palette (Limited Edition)
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A mermaid-inspired eyeshadow palette that houses 14 matte and metallic shades, all stashed in a dreamy, iridescent seashell compact.

What it does:

This palette provides glimmering neutrals, jewel tones and aquatic hues in matte and metallic formulas to create looks fit for a sea siren. With Amazonian clay and mineral pigments, the creamy powder formula blends beautifully, while balancing the skin on the lids to prevent pigment creasing or fading.

name: Plaisir Box
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A carefully selected assortment of three tempting eyeshadow delights.

What it does:

The ZOEVA Plaisir Box merges the full pleasure and varieties of chocolate, transferred into cosmetics. From dark brown to fawn and white, indulge in a carefully selected assortment of three tempting vitamin E-enriched eyeshadow delights: sumptuous pralinés, creamy caramel and exquisite white chocolate.

What it includes:

*1 collector's box
* 3 eyeshadow palettes: Caramel Melange Eyeshadow Palette, Blanc Fusion Eyeshadow Palette, Cocoa Blend Eyeshadow Palette

What else you need to know:

  • Finishes: Matte, Satin, Metallic, Duo Chrome, Pearl, Matte with glitter
  • Free of parabens, mineral oils, perfume and phthalates
  • Box size: 20.1 x 9.5 x 9.2 cm
  • Palette size: 18.8 x 8.8 x 1.0 cm
  • Diameter per pan: 2.6 cm
  • Net weight: 621.5 g

name: Eyeshadow Palette 5 - Metallic Duo Chrome (Limited Edition)
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A limited-edition palette with five eyeshadows in shades that beautifully pair together.

What it does:

These soft-to-the-touch hybrids of Natasha's signature eyeshadow formula are long-lasting, super buildable, easy to blend, and have zero fallout.These creamy, innovative eyeshadows feature the classic Natasha Denona metallics, mattes, duo-chromes, and sparkling chroma crystals. There’s a solution for every occasion.

name: Rainforest Of The Sea Foil Finger Paints Shadow Palette
description:
What it is:

What it is:

An eyeshadow palette with new, textured foil formulas that are so plush and pigmented, you can paint them on with your fingers.

What it does:

Three warm-toned foil eyeshadows with a crushed velvet texture melt onto lids, while the split-pan iridescent and silver sheer sparkling shades can be worn alone or layered on other hues as transforming topcoats. Makes eyelids look smoother with good-for-you antioxidants from our Rainforest of the Sea™ complex while the turquoise compact adds aquatic awesomeness to your makeup bag.

What it includes:

Palette includes 3 foil finish shades and a split pan with 2 sparkling shades: * Gold Coast (Champagne) * Sailor’s Delight (Burgundy) * Sea Glass (Chocolate) * Stargazer (Sunset/Silver)

name: Tartelette Vault (Limited Edition)
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A collector’s set of three best-selling 12-pan eyeshadow palettes, inspired by tarte’s creative & passionate fans.

What it does:

Makes eyeshadow dreams come true with 36 Amazonian clay-powered shades for your own personal wardrobe of unlimited, ultrapigmented, longwearing looks.

What it includes:

  • tartelette™ Matte Palette – The original tartelette palette, which features a variety of cool and warm shades all in a creamy matte powder formula
  • tartelette™ Bloom Palette – A mix of luminous shimmers and silky mattes in super wearable warm tones
  • tartelette™ Toasted Palette – Rich matte and lustrous shimmer shadows in a mix of warm, cozy hues

name: Sunset Eyeshadow Palette
description:
What it is:

What it is:

An eyeshadow palette with 15 shades in Natasha’s signature matte, duo chrome, metallic, and chroma crystal finishes.

What it does:

Inspired by the colours of the sunset, this palette will heat up your look with fiery eyeshadows in a combination of warm brown tones, burnt oranges, reds, golds, bronzes, and yellows. Internationally renowned makeup artist Natasha Denona developed her own eyeshadow formulas after struggling for over 20 years with eyeshadows that were dry, dull, and difficult to blend. Natasha’s easy-to-use pressed pigments have been chosen as the best in the world by the most influential beauty gurus and leading makeup artists. All four finishes—chroma crystal, matte, metallic, and duo-chrome—offer extraordinarily rich pigment, ultra-high colour payoff, and buttery, easy-to-blend formulas.

What it includes:

15 Eyeshadows (0.08 oz/ 2.5 g) in Atmosphere (metallic rose bronze), Morgana (duo chrome red with gold), Mandarine (duo chrome mandarin with gold), Ice Gold (chroma sheer cream with gold sparkle), Bronzage (chroma crystal light copper), Aubade (chroma crystal warm gold), Sundazed (chroma crystal gold), Bermuda (matte pastel peachy nude), Panjin (matte red), Igneous (matte deep brown), Sol (matte warm yellow), Terra (matte terracotta), Horizon (matte warm orange), Vulcano (matte dark brown with mauve), and Sinai (matte burnt terracotta).

What else you need to know:

This product is formulated without parabens, sulfates, and phthalates.

name: Lila Eyeshadow Palette
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A palette featuring 15 brand new gorgeous eye shades in a combination of warm and cool violets, plums, and fuchsias—perfect for every skin tone.

What it does:

Inspired by her love for the purple colour scale, Natasha created the Lila Eyeshadow Palette just in time for fall. This must-have palette includes all four classic eyeshadow textures in her signature chroma crystal, creamy matte, metallic, and innovative duo chrome finishes. Use the velvety shades alone or layer together for head-turning, versatile eye looks, day or night.

What it includes:

15 Eyeshadows in Per Se (matte medium smoky purple-grey), Viola (metallic medium fuchsia-violet), Amara (matte medium brown-berry), Cyclone (duo chrome bronze/copper with pink highlight), Nude Vino (matte medium nude-grape), Layla (metallic dark grey mauve), Amethyst (metallic medium bright violet), Magnetic (metallic medium bright fuchsia), Magnolia (chroma crytals light warm champagne), Nude (matte mauve medium), Juneau (sheer metallic light lavender), Livid (duo chrome medium lilac with silver-blue highlight), Puprure (metallic medium burgundy), Dragon Bite (duo chrome medium red with green highlight), and Helio (metallic light pastel nude rose).

What else you need to know:

This product is formulated without parabens, sulfates, and phthalates.

name: Star Eyeshadow Palette
description:
What it is:

What it is:

An eyeshadow palette with 18 shades, including two never-before-seen textures.

What it does:

Star Eyeshadow palette features four Crystal Eyeshadows, nine Creamy Mattes, three Metallic, and two Duo-Chromes with silky-soft textures to create infinite eye looks. Each long-lasting shade delivers strong colour payoff thanks to a high concentration of pure pigment and is easily blendable without creasing. Internationally renowned makeup artist Natasha Denona developed her own eyeshadow formulas after struggling for over 20 years with eyeshadows that were dry, dull, and difficult to blend. Natasha’s easy-to-use pressed pigments have been chosen as the best in the world by the most influential beauty gurus and leading makeup artists.

What it includes:

  • 4 Crystal Eyeshadows (0.08 oz/ 2.26 g) in 101K Spectrum (sparkling golden brown), 109K Cosmo (sparkling golden olive), 112K Galaxia (icy sheer shade with multi-coloured crystals), and 116K Polaris (sheer golden nude with gold crystals).
  • 9 Creamy Matte Eyeshadows (0.08 oz/ 2.26 g) in 102CM Earth (matte dark brown), 104CM Flesh (matte warm nude transition), 106CM Gemma (matte dark brown with red undertone), 108CM Titania (matte neutral medium brown), 110CM Diadem (matte grey-violet transition), 111CM Vega (matte transition with pink undertone), 113CM Phoenix (matte medium bright plum), 115CM Electra (matte medium grape), and 117CM Atik (matte medium transition nude with cool undertone).
  • 3 Metallic Eyeshadows (0.08 oz/ 2.26 g) in 103M Bellatrix (metallic nude), 107M Atria (metallic burnt bronze), and 118M Rhea (metallic coral).
  • 2 Duo-Chrome Eyeshadows (0.08 oz/ 2.26 g) in 105DC Orion (duo chrome green-brown), 114DC Supernova (duo chrome brown with silver)

What else you need to know:

This product is formulated without parabens, sulfates, and phthalates.

name: Rodeo Belle Palette
description:
What it is:

What it is:

The Rodeo Belle Palette is inspired by a combination of femininity and the Wild West.

What it does:

This palette contains shades like Gunmetal, Cactus Green, Brown and Dusted Rose which evoke a rustic yet very dainty medley of colours to suit different skin tones. Each shade is made of fine micronised pigments that ensure excellent coverage and superior colour payoff.

name: Couture Contour Palette
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A single colour palette with five intense, ready-to-wear eyeshadows.

What it does:

Using crystal based pearls made from micro-particles, each shade reflects light brighter than other eyeshadows. The texture is so soft that colour glides on smoothly, evenly, blends effortlessy and will stay in place for up to 12 hours. Two separate applicators, allow for precision application.

name: Rainforest Of The Sea Eyeshadow Palette
description:
What it is:

What it is:

An 8 shade eye palette featuring Vol. II or Vol. III eyeshadows.

What it does:

Discover the ultimate eyeshadow collection with this eyeshadow palette by tarte. Showcasing the best of Vol. II with a full spectrum of creamy cool-tone powders, the soft hybrid formula is part cream, part powder with oxygenated light-reflecting spheres for a plump, smooth texture and seamless payoff. The Vol. III palette headlines all the buttery, highlighting neutrals —no primer or brush required, just the warmth of your fingertip.

name: Liner Love
description:
What it is:

What it is:

12 hour, all day waterproof, clinically-shown lash loving, anti-aging crème gel eyeliner. To finally give women a formula designed to nourish lashes, while treating the delicate eye area with No Tug® technology.

What it does:

  • Clinically shown 12-hour Waterproof
  • Ultra smooth liner look
  • Crease and crack proof
  • Lash Enhancing Peptide Serum treats your lashes
  • Liner won’t dry out!

name: Always On Liquid Eye Liner
description:
What it is:

What it is:

An ergonomic liquid eyeliner pen that gives you total control and ultimate precision.

What it does:

This long-wearing, waterproof eye liner was made for control freaks. It’s easy to hold and features ergonomic grips along the barrel where your fingers can rest comfortably. Draw ultra-thin lines or build a dramatic, winged-out eye look like a makeup artist thanks to the flexible felt tip. It gives you the maximum amount of high-pigment black colour with every stroke - no skipping, tugging, flaking or smudging. The colour stays on, won't fade and looks freshly applied for 24 hours.

What else you need to know:

  • Sweat, humidity and transfer-resistant
  • Quick-drying and easy to remove
  • Cruelty-free
  • Vegan

name: Heavy Metal Glitter Eyeliner
description:
What it is:

What it is:

All the glitz of glam rock—without the spandex or bad hair—Urban Decay’s Heavy Metal Glitter Eyeliner contains superfine glitter in a clear base that dries down quickly and really stays put (for long wear without any fallout).

What it does:

The precise, thin-tipped brush makes it easy to create fine, glittery lines. Want more sparkle? Use the side of the brush to sweep sparkle all over your lids. Or, for an even bolder, jewel-encrusted look, remove the wiper (the little piece that controls how much product comes out of the bottle) and tap on Heavy Metal with your fingers. The glitter is suspended in a gel, so it won’t separate in the bottle. Peach and cucumber extract condition the skin, while carrot extract smooths and softens.

name: Highliner Matte Gel Eye Crayon Eyeliner Mini
description:
What it is:

What it is:

What it is:
A waterproof, gel eye crayon for a bold, matte finish in a mini version.
What it does:
Experience the intense colour payoff, amazing glide, and 12-hour wear of Marc Jacobs Beauty’s original award-winning Highliner Gel Eye Crayon eyeliner - now re-envisioned in a bold, matte finish. Each of the hues are glitter-free and intensified by super-rich pigment. They’re formulated to glide on smoothly for precise application, and they give you 15 seconds of play time before setting in place for wear that lasts all day, making it ideal for pulling off versatile eye looks. Line to define your eyes, smudge it before it sets to impart an instant, smoky eye, layer as an eyeshadow base, or draw on artistic graphic liner looks. Its waterproof gel formula makes it well-suited for lining the inner rim. It’s designed with a clever sharpener, hidden in the base of the liner to allow for a precise point.
What else you need to know:
* The intense, vivid hues are inspired by Marc Jacobs’s boldly bright resort 2017 collection. For maximum impact, pair with O!mega Lash Volumizing Mascara’s colourful shades. The liner features a clever built-in sharpener at its base.
* This product is formulated without parabens, sulfates and phthalates.

name: Party Eyes Collection
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Smoke out your party look with a trio of eyeshadows and mascara guaranteed to give you smoldering eyes.

What it does:

Take centre stage with the Rock Out & Lash Out Mascara in Beatnik Black designed to amplify volume and curl while coating every lash in intense carbon black. Layer and blend two shades of waterproof Me & My Shadow Liner in Bronze and Charcoal. Each intense eyeshadow liner comes with a built-in blending brush for instant smokey eyes.

name: Skinny Duo - Skinny Brush Mascara and Liquid Eyeliner
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Lengthen lashes and create the perfect cat eye with Eyeko’s Skinny Duo.

What it does:

The Skinny Brush Mascara captures even the shortest lashes to lengthen and extend for dramatic definition using a conditioning formula that prevents breakage and promotes growth. The Skinny Liquid Eyeliner is an easy-to-use pen that give you complete control to apply its colour-intense, smudge-proof formula in a single stroke.

name: Black Magic Duo - Black Magic Mascara and Liquid Eyeliner
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Volumise your lashes and accentuate your eyes with Eyeko’s Black Magic Duo, a set of uber-lustrous mascara and ultra-black liquid eyeliner for seriously bewitching eyes.

What it does:

Transform your lashes with the ultimate mascara designed with a curvaceous helix brush that lifts and curls every lash without clumping. Make effortless cat eyes with one fluid stroke of the liquid liner featuring an advanced WIDELASH™ formula that enhances lash growth and volume.

What it includes:

  • Black Magic Mascara: creates drama, volume and curl with carbon black finish.
  • Black Magic Eyeliner: glides on smoothly and stays on all day with fading.

What else you need to know:

  • Mascara is enriched with conditioning keratin and shea butter.
  • Liner is inspired by traditional Japanese calligraphy.

name: Collectible Make-up Bag
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Our coated cotton canvas makeup bags are big enough to hold all your beauty essentials making them the perfect travel tote.

What it does:

Emblazoned with Eyeko affirmations on one side and our signature ‘eyekon’ print on the other. Lined with black cotton and finished with a heavy-duty silver ring zip-pull.

name: Black Magic Liquid Eyeliner
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Eyeko's blackest liquid eyeliner yet with precision brush tip for perfect application and designed for after-hours allure.

What it does:

Created in Japan and inspired by traditional calligraphy, our latest liner makes cat eyes effortless even for liquid liner novices. Smooth, fluid single stroke colour glides on and stays on for all day finish without fading.

name: Under-Eye Flash
description:
What it is:

What it is:

The 3CE Under-Eye Flash is a waterproof eyeliner that provides a lovely depth to the eyes.

What it does:

Its creamy texture subtly defines the eyes and complements already dolled up peepers through its delicate sheen. This is great for achieving elegant-looking sultry eye makeup. Under-Eye Flash features a soft and creamy texture and is formulated with rich colours that provide depth and long-lasting wear.

name: Long Lasting Kohl
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Create an intense eye look with this eye pencil.

What it does:

This kohl pencil provides a brightening effect by creating contrast, making the whites of the eyes appear brighter and the rest of the eye more dramatic. The creamy texture glides on and provides optimal comfort for all-day wear.

What else you need to know:

  • Smooth, blendable formula
  • Contains cornflower extract for soft texture
  • Delivers long-lasting wear

name: Fineliner Ultra Skinny Gel Eye Crayon
description:
What it is:

What it is:

An ultra-skinny eyeliner with the same amazing glide and payoff as the award-winning Highliner Gel Eye Crayon.

What it does:

Create a wide-eyed look with Marc Jacobs Beauty’s Fineliner Ultra-Skinny Gel Eye Crayon. It captures the ease and glide of the award-winning Highliner Gel Eye Crayon in a revolutionary ultra-thin, two millimeter, unbreakable tip. Featuring a transformative gel formula, it glides on precisely for flawless application and sets in place for all-day wear. With its precise, malleable tip, Fineliner is ideal for tightlining and lining the waterline with ease—and with its waterproof wear, it lasts. The slim, striped design of the eyeliner's case was inspired by a Marc Jacobs Collection dress.

What else you need to know:

  • This product is free from parabens, sulfates and phthalates

name: Calligraph:Ink
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A high-technique tool, this Asian calligraphy-inspired eyeliner and brush draws seamlessly and gives eyes the right kind of drama and definition.

What it does:

Made for every woman, you can achieve stunningly framed eyes like a pro.

What else you need to know:

  • Has intense colour pay-off, and is water- and sweat-proof
  • The improved formula dries quickly on skin and delivers an 18-hour lasting wear

name: Quickliner For Eyes Intense
description:
What it is:

What it is:

No need to be subtle when it's now so easy to move into the deepest, most dramatic range. Find all the intensity of a liquid liner in one simple stroke. Silky formula glides on. Stays on all day. Never needs sharpening. 'Smoke' with the smudge tip on the opposite end. Ophthalmologist Tested.

What it does:

Two great ways to wear it: * Create a dramatic winged-eye look. * Use it as a long-lasting eyeshadow.

name: Always On Gel Liner
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A 24-hour, highly pigmented gel eyeliner for smooth, intense colour.

What it does:

This super-saturated gel liner glides on effortlessly and stays put for 24 hours. The waterproof, pigment-rich formula remains blendable for a few seconds after application, giving you playtime to correct and create limitless looks.

What else you need to know:

  • Formulated without parabens, phthalates, fragrance, talc, alcohol and sodium lauryl sulfate
  • Not tested on animals
  • Ingredients subject to change. Refer to packaging

name: Colorblock Liner
description:
What it is:

What it is:

An all-new collection of felt eyeliners in 8 colours that allow you to "mix it up" every day, in the blink of an eye.

What it does:

Featuring a powerful Korean formula, dazzling colours and a flexible precision tip for easy application, these 8 tiny superheroes will make you shine! Draw, scribble, tag and unleash your creativity with no guilt.

name: Shade and Illuminate Eye Kohl Duo
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A dual-ended intense kohl eyeliner pencil that both illuminates and defines the eyes for a dramatic, sultry effect.

What it does:

A creamy, true hybrid formula, the dual-ended intense kohl pencil lines, defines, accents and frames the eyes. One end illuminates with a highlighting shade, while the other end features a deeper shade that enhances eyes with dramatic effects. It combines innovative technology with rich colour pigments and comfortably glides onto the skin for an ultra-fluid application. Use outside and inside the lid for an instantly sensual and sultry effect.

name: La Petite Robe Noire Eyeliner
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A waterproof eyeliner with 12-hour ultra-long hold that won’t run or settle into creases.

What it does:

This ultra-black, no-transfer waterproof eyeliner will see you through your craziest days with 12-hour hold. Its unique wheel-shaped applicator glides over the eyelid in the blink of an eye to trace any line, from the finest to the thickest!

name: Matte Exposure Palette
description:
What it is:

What it is:

An all-matte eye palette with soft, versatile neutrals in deep, smoldering hues.

What it does:

This all-matte palette has you covered with its silky, blendable shadows that double as stay-put liners. Created in Smashbox’s L.A. photo studio for cover shots and pictures with a flash, these must-have matte shades are designed to make eyes pop without any reflective sheen. It includes a double-ended shadow/liner brush to line, define, and contour your eyes and a simple, step-by-step guide to getting a smoky, softly defined look and cat-eye for six different eye shapes.

What it includes:

  • 12 Matte Wet/Dry Eyeshadow (0.035 oz each) in Spice (burnt orange), Blackberry (deep burgundy), Desert (medium/neutral brown), Sumatra (deep brown), Tonal (peach nude), Suede (soft red brown), Buff (pink nude), Grounded (medium cool brown), Drizzle (muted purple), Black Plum (deep purple), Truffle (light grey), and Blackout (black).
  • 2 Matte Base Eyeshadow (0.07 oz each) in Wheat (soft warm brown) and Vanilla (soft light beige).
  • Double-ended shadow/liner brush.
  • Step-by-step guide.

What else you need to know:

  • This product is formulated without parabens, sulfates, and phthalates.

name: Liner Vinyl Eyeliner
description:
What it is:

What it is:

An intense, fluid eyeliner that defines your look with a vinyl sheen for sophisticated radiance.

What it does:

This ultra-precise liquid eyeliner deposits highly pigmented colour and sleek texture. The ultra-thin brush allows you to create whatever look you desire—from a thick to a thin line. The black shade is infused with pearlescent rose and violet flecks for an intense, iridescent jet-vinyl finish.

What else you need to know:

  • This product is formulated without parabens.
  • Product Shade: N1 Black

name: Pencil Magic Khol Eyeliner
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A long-lasting, pigment-rich eyeliner.

What it does:

A next-generation texture, gentle application, and intense pigment make this eyeliner a makeup kit must-have. The innovative formula contains silicone for smooth, easy application while ploythylene hollow spheres and kaolin help colour stay put all day.

What else you need to know:

  • Product Shade: 01 Black

name: Glide Liner Waterproof Gel Eyeliner
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A super-concentrated waterproof kohl liner.

What it does:

Get intense colour and long-lasting wear that won’t run off or smudge from humidity or sweat. The super-concentrated formula is intensely pigmented and lasts up to 12 hours.

name: 3CE Long Wear Eye Crayon
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A long-lasting eyeshadow that doesn't crease on eyelids.

What it does:

This automatic eyeshadow stick glides on smoothly and will keep your eye look defined for a long time. The highly-pigmented formula delivers intense, hue-rich colour. Shimmering, lustrous pearls create a depth of colour for a more defined look. The airtight container keeps air out. Its waterproof nature will keep colour in place for hours.

name: Glitter Pop! Peel Off Liner
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A peel-off glitter eyeliner for a dramatic, head-turning look.

What it does:

Paint it on and peel it off for the most glamorously dramatic, fabulous liner ever. Innovative film formers lock down glitter so it stays put until you peel it off. This goof-proof, budge-proof glitter eyeliner comes in an array of sparkly shades that can be worn by themselves or layered for a buildable, colourful finish that dries within seconds. The formula dries to a soft, comfortable finish and peels off with no mess or fallout, while the applicator is designed to make it easy to create multilayered eye looks.

name: Highliner Gel Eye Crayon Eyeliner
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A gel pot eyeliner in a crayon that delivers intense colour and 12-hour waterproof wear and amazing glide in shimmer and matte finishes.

What it does:

Experience the luxury of long-lasting gel eyeliner with the ease of a pencil. Make a bold statement with this extreme-wear, waterproof eyeliner that glides on effortlessly to deliver instant colour payoff. Exclusive to Marc Jacobs Beauty, the super-malleable formula offers versatility of application. Apply Highliner for flawless, precise lines, or smudge immediately after lining for an instant smoky eye. Once it sets, it’s budge-proof all day long.

Highliner was inspired by the idea of a woman getting ready to go out at night, sitting in the lobby of a chic hotel, and sweeping on her eyeliner for an instantly irresistible look. It’s formulated with innovative gel ingredients, as well as conditioning vitamin E and rosehip seed oil. Its intense colour payoff is available in an array of richly pigmented shades with two finishes: original shimmer or high-impact matte.

name: 1.5MM Mechanical Gel Eye Liner
description:
What it is:

What it does:

Encapsulated in a 1.5MM mechanical pencil, this liner offers precision accuracy and ease of application. No pot, no brush, no clean-up required. Just two clicks to create a variety of eye looks that resist transfer for extended wear.

description:

Easily achieve eye lining perfection with this high-pigment, sweat-proof, smudge-proof, waterproof liner that stays put all day. The ultra-fine roller ball glides across the lash line for precise ink application allowing you to create a variety of looks with ease. Ink dries down matte, but never flat.

name: Perfect Pencil

What it is:

What it is:

name: Liquid Last Liner
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A rich black liquid eye liner that combines long-lasting wear with a non-smudge, non-flake precision line.

What it does:

Liquid Last Liner combines long-lasting wear with a non-smudge, non-flake precision line. It glides on effortlessly, applied with its own brush to draw a perfectly defined line.

What else you need to know:

  • Long-wearing
  • Transfer-resistant
  • Waterproof
  • Ophthalmologist tested

name: Pro Longwear Eye Liner

What it is:

Its 12-hour water-resistant formula stays put and is smudge-proof.

Brush sold separately.

Achieve eye perfection with this high-pigment, waterproof liner that stays put all day for a fade-, melt-, crack-, and run-resistant finish. What it is:

A 24 hour, waterproof liquid liner with highly pigmented colour and ultra-fine precision.

Aqua XL Ink Liner stays put until you take it off. With an ultra-fine, felt tip applicator, this waterproof formula delivers the best in liquid liner wear. The long-lasting formula ensures highly pigmented colour that won’t smudge, transfer or fade. Edge or accent your lids from corner to corner and beyond with this easy, perfectly designed applicator. name: Tarteist Double Take Eyeliner
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Define eyes like a pro with this triple-black, 12-hour eyeliner. It features two versatile formulas for a flawless, sculpted stare.

What it does:

Tightly line and contour eyes with the velvety smooth, twist-up pencil liner, powered by Amazonian clay to glide on like silk but wear like iron™. It perfectly traces along the lash line and inner rim, filling in spaces and enhancing the appearance of lash volume instantly. On the opposite end, a long-wearing liquid liner features a precision tarteist tip and hydrating, quick-dry formula that paints on pigment and creates a crisp or dramatic wing. The double-ended formulas can be paired together for a sleek smoky eye that lasts.

name: Soft Kohl Eyeliner
description:
What it is:

What it is:

This eyeliner contains a thick and creamy texture, which glides smoothly onto your eyelids. Formulated with waterproof and sharp pigments, it delivers excellent colour payoff. It also provides a firm hold for controlled application.

The light shade brightens up every look and instantly makes your eyes appear larger and more awake for a crisp, radiant beauty statement.

What else you need to know:

Zoeva soft kohl eyeliners are free of parabens and formaldehyde.

name: Lights, Camera, Lashes™  Precision Longwear Liner - Black

What it is:

Featuring trendy, vibrant packaging with a neon purple design, it’ll inspire you to bring it along for every summer adventure.

name: Ink Liner

This product is vegan and completely free of animal-derived ingredients.

Line to define your eyes, smudge it before it sets to impart an instant, smoky eye, layer as an

A truly innovative, long-wearing, waterproof eyeliner that makes your eyes look younger instead of older! Our eyes are the windows to the soul, and what better way to enhance whatever eye colour, or shape you have been blessed with than applying a touch of rich pigmented liner? The problem we encountered was that in order to achieve rich, luxe colour, most eyeliners pulled and tugged at the gentle skin of your lids. We wanted to create a truly good for you formula, that would never pull or tug on your lids-the results, our brand new, Automatic No-Tug® Waterproof Gel Eyeliners!
What is it: Utilizing cutting-edge anti-aging no-tug technology, these new Automatic No-Tug® Waterproof Gel Eyeliners glide on saturated, rich colour without tugging on your delicate eyelids! Developed with plastic surgeons, these innovative yet easy-to-use eyeliners do the work for you, plus they’re infused with anti-aging technology and skin-care benefits including hydrolyzed silk, collagen, and anti-oxidants.

No Tug® technology applies rich pigment without tugging on lids during application
Clinically shown waterproof even after 8 hours of wear

name: Tarteist Clay Paint Liner
description:
What it is:

What it is:

What it does:

The unique formula features fewer waxes, cushioned pigments, and a special development process that allows for the creamiest texture and smoothest application. The tube was created with an innovative artistic delivery system, a tapered tip, and a flat blending stage so you can simply pick up the ideal amount of product and blend for foolproof perfection. The sketcher-angled bamboo liner brush easily glides the plush, triple-black, formula along the contours of the eyelid. Featuring the same waterproof, 12-hour wear as tarte’s signature clay pot liners, this next-generation liner has cushion slide technology that lets you custom create your own signature lines without ever pulling or transferring.

name: Perversion Waterproof Fine Point Eye Pen

What it is:

There are two universal truths about black liquid liner: It can never be too black or too perfect. Nail the look every time with Perversion Waterproof Fine-Point Eye Pen. This super-smooth, free-flowing pen lays down intensely black lines with absolute precision.

What it does:

We loaded this pen with the ultimate brush and a cartridge system that allows for a constant flow of ink for the smoothest application. Then, of course, we filled it with our notoriously blackest black shade, Perversion. The ultra fine tip glides on smooth without skipping or pulling, providing a smooth, controlled application. Easily create everything from fine lines to bold, thick lines. Our waterproof formula lays down blacker-than-black lines that dry down quickly and last all day (no smudging, running or feathering). You’ll love the colour payoff—it’s just like all of our Perversion products.

Like the mascara that inspired it, Perversion Waterproof Fine-Point Eye Pen comes in an eye-catching, metallized black tube with pale purple artwork.
