What it does:

Enriched with Vitamin E and Natural Beeswax, this lipstick is the perfect solution to dry lips. Its hydrating and pigmented formula keeps lips moisturised and ensures that the colour stays all day. Vitamin E has moisturising and anti-oxidant properties while Natural Beeswax offers a rich texture, keeping lips hydrated for long periods after application.

What else you need to know:

  • Paraben-free

name: Lipstickwitu
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A lipstick that is both pigmented and not drying to the lips, and a perfect accessory to bring with you anywhere and anytime.

What it does:

Enriched with Vitamin E and Natural Beeswax, this lipstick is the perfect solution to dry lips. Its hydrating and pigmented formula keeps lips moisturised and ensures that the colour stays all day. Vitamin E has moisturising and anti-oxidant properties while Natural Beeswax offers a rich texture, keeping lips hydrated for long periods after application.

What else you need to know:

  • Paraben-free

name: Shu Uemura x Yazbukey - Rouge Unlimited Supreme Matte (Limited Edition)
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A supreme matter lip collection that offers a beautiful matte finish, vibrant colour pay-off and a melting texture.

What it does:

Shu Uemura collaborates with Yazbukey, a Paris-based jewellery designer known for her iconic, bold and edgy lip motifs: "c'est ahh lips", for the first-ever lip-focused "mattitude collection".

name: Artist Liquid Matte Lipstick
description:
What it is:

What it is:

An ultra-matte liquid lipstick with insane colour payoff and crazy long wear.

What it does:

Finally, a comfortable liquid lipstick with intense colour in an ultra-matte finish. With concentrated pigments, Artist Liquid Matte provides truly matte, saturated colour payoff with a lightweight feel. Its unique formula boasts beeswax for long-lasting wear and avocado oil for soft, nourished lips. It's an ultra-matte, liquid lipstick with high colour payoff and 20-hour, comfortable wear. Its precise applicator coats and defines every peak and valley of your lips to perfection.

name: 3CE Water Gloss
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Pigmented lipgloss that provides high shine and luscious colour.

What it does:

Create moist, glossy lips with this light lip gloss that isupplements moisture on the lips with the use of 3CE's elixir capsule.

name: Lipstick
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A full-coverage, 100% natural, hydrating lipstick in a choice of 14 shades.

What it does:

Intense colour meets deep conditioning with this full-coverage lipstick. Formulated with nourishing beeswax, moringa oil, raspberry seed oil and vitamin E extracts, its naturally hydrating properties can provide up to eight hours of moisture for dry chapped lips. All 14 versatile shades deliver luscious, bold colour with a smooth, satin finish. Get ready to pucker up!

What else you need to know:

  • Recyclable packaging

name: Ultra Shine Lip Gloss
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A high-shine, colour-saturated lip gloss designed to achieve a bold and glamorous mouth.

What it does:

This lip gloss has high adherence and is so comfortable to wear. Its shiny finish can be worn alone or layered over lip colour to add dimension.

name: Lip Lacquer Lip Gloss
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A clear lip gloss that creates a reflective shine and a lavishly soft feel.

What it does:

This clear gloss lacquers lips with precious pulverized pearls, creating a reflective shine and a lavishly soft feel. These pearls give a polished sophistication to nude lips, or create a deeply sensual sheen when layered over lip colour.

name: Lip Lacquer Extreme Lip Gloss
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A lipstick that delivers pure, unadulterated liquid lip colour in scintillating Liquid Metal Matte.

What it does:

Sleek sophisticated metal collides with pristine velvet matte. Rich and creamy upon application, the luxe formula transforms into feather-light, concentrated colour in a fade-resistant, full-coverage brushed chrome effect. Drenched in long-wearing, lightweight, stay-true vibrant colour, your lips will delight in a micro-fine pigment of two-tone pearl.

name: Gloss Crayon
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Six creamy, full-coverage shades of glossy lip colour in a modern crayon for truly beautiful lips.

What it does:

This creamy lip colour hydrates and moisturises the lips, leaving them feeling soft and smooth. Its lightweight moisture formula, infused with Shea Butter, Kendi Oil, and Jojoba Oil, makes for a comfortable, everyday wear, either alone or layered under a Lip Gloss or Lip Shine. Here's to precise application in a playful form without the hassle and mess of sharpening.

What else you need to know:

  • No added flavour or fragrance

name: Twist-On Lip
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A "Twist & Design" dual lipstick that creates the most beautiful "plump & contour" to design the perfect ombré lip.

What it does:

This highly concentrated dual lipstick features sheer and intense premium pigments, and its glossy formula reveals sensually shiny lips. This one powerful lipstick offer three different ways to apply, giving six amazing different results.

name: L'absolu Lacquer
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A liquid lipstick that delivers colour, comfort and long-lasting shine.

What it does:

After the matte effect, we see the return of shine, but this time in a lacquered effect. Lancôme has created 18 of the most beautiful lacquer colours with vibrant colour payoff and the perfect high shine lip that lasts up to 6 hours thanks to the formula’s honeycomb structure. It’s so lightweight and ultra thin that you get that comfortable bare-lip feel yet with the beauty of extreme shine that is non-sticky. Enriched with glycerin, the lipstick keeps your lips moisturised and hydrated for up to 8 hours. Its precision applicator makes it so easy to build colour and shine intensity, layer by layer.

name: Natural Nudes
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Richly-pigmented, creamy, natural nude lipsticks.

What it does:

These bold nude lipstick colours, infused with coconut butter complex, help keep lips soft and moisturised. Highly pigmented for intense colour payoff, they give the lips a balmy, hydrating texture and a coconutty scent.

What else you need to know:

  • 10 modern neutral shades
  • 8-hour long-wearing colour
  • A nude shade for every complexion

name: Glow Gloss
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A luxe, conditioning lip formula with the shine of a lip gloss, pigment of a liquid lipstick and nourishing benefits of a lip balm.

What it does:

3-D light-reflecting pigments and ginger, peppermint oil and a plumping peptide instantly make lips appear fuller and smoother. Vitamin C & E and hydrating Shea and Muru Muru Butters soften and condition the lips. This range of 10 stunning shades, inspired by the best-selling Shimmering Skin Perfector Highlighters and Luminous Blushes, complements and enhances any look.

name: Always On Liquid Lipstick Metallic Matte
description:
What it is:

What it is:

An 8-hour matte liquid lipstick that stays put and won’t dry out your lips.

What it does:

This 8-hour matte lipstick feels light, stays put and delivers pigmented colour in a range of nudes, bolds and metallic. It’s specifically formulated to be comfortable and not dry out your lips.

name: Makeup Superstars Set
description:
What it is:

What it is:

An exclusive multi-branded collection of best-selling makeup must haves.

What it does:

Makeup Superstars is the ultimate makeup-lovers set of all the cult-favourite beauty goodies at the top of our wish list. Create endless looks from elegant and understated to bold and glamorous with makeup top-sellers or eyes, lips, and cheeks—plus makeup remover for a clean slate at the end of the day.

What it includes:

  • Benefit Cosmetics Hoola Quickie Contour Stick.
  • Urban Decay Naked Skin One & Done.
  • Marc Jacobs Beauty deluxe-size Highliner Gel Eye Crayon in Blacquer.
  • TARTE deluxe-size Ready, Set, Radiant Skin Mist.
  • Nudestix Illumi-Naughty Nudies Glow.
  • TARTE deluxe-size Amazonian Clay 12-Hour Highlighter in Stunner.
  • NARS mini-size Orgasm Blush in Orgasm.
  • Nudestix Intense Matte Lip + Cheek Pencil in Raven.
  • Kat Von D Tattoo Liner.
  • Sephora deluxe-size Waterproof Eye Makeup Remover.
  • Cover FX Custom Enhancer Drops in Moonlight.
  • Nudestix Intense Matte Lip + Cheek Pencil in Royal

name: 10 Year Anniversary Everlasting Glimmer Veil Lipstick (Limited Edition)
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A new, limited-edition Everlasting Glimmer Veil Liquid Lipstick in “Gold Skool”, a metallic gold shade specially created in honour of Kat Von D Beauty’s 10-Year Anniversary.

What it does:

Create gold-leafed lip looks with Everlasting Glimmer Veil Liquid Lipstick in new and exclusive shade, “Gold Skool,” created to celebrate Kat Von D Beauty’s 10-Year Anniversary. This breakthrough formula combines the same long-wear, weightless innovation behind Everlasting Liquid Lipstick, with a multi-dimensional liquid-crystal finish. This is the first glitter liquid lipstick to deliver 24-hour wear in a rich, glimmery, non-gritty formula that is so lightweight, it feels like nothing.

name: Sugar Lip Coconut Hydrating Balm
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A Sephora-exclusive, sinfully rich, cushiony balm that delivers 24-hour moisture with an addictive limited-edition coconut scent.

What it does:

This next-generation lip balm immediately locks in moisture and delivers unbeatable 24-hour hydration for soft, healthy, plump-looking lips with an addictive coconut scent. It leaves no sticky residue but instead comforts on contact, blanketing the lips with a gorgeous velvety shine and protecting against dry, chapped lips.

Enriched with moisture-preserving sugar, the sumptuous lip treatment seals in moisture and defends against dehydration all day long. Apricot kernel oil helps to nourish and maintain elasticity, while black currant seed oil helps to protect and promote suppleness. Grapeseed oil works to moisturise, smoothen, and soften, while vitamin E helps to protect.

name: Sugar Lip Chocolate Hydrating Balm (Limited Edition)
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A Sephora-exclusive, sinfully rich, cushiony balm that delivers 24-hour moisture with an addictive limited-edition chocolate scent.

What it does:

This next-generation lip balm immediately locks in moisture and delivers unbeatable 24-hour hydration for soft, healthy, plump-looking lips with an addictive chocolate scent. It leaves no sticky residue but instead comforts on contact, blanketing the lips with a gorgeous velvety shine and protecting against dry, chapped lips.

Enriched with moisture-preserving sugar, the sumptuous lip treatment seals in moisture and defends against dehydration all day long. Apricot kernel oil helps to nourish and maintain elasticity, while black currant seed oil helps to protect and promote suppleness. Grapeseed oil works to moisturise, smoothen, and soften, while vitamin E helps to protect.

name: Lolita Lip Duo
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A mini duo of Everlasting Liquid Lipsticks, featuring “Lolita” and “Lolita II”—Kat Von D’s most coveted shades of all time.

What it does:

Discover the shade that redefined the classic neutral lip. This duo of covetable favourites features two takes on Kat Von D Beauty’s bestselling shade of all time, “Lolita,” the original chestnut rose, and “Lolita II,” her brighter alter ego. The world fell in love with “Lolita” because it contains a perfect balance of tones, for a neutral shade that works on every complexion. Everlasting Liquid Lipstick gives you long-lasting wear and high-pigment colour. Its creamy, colour-rich formula glides onto lips like a gloss and dries to a true matte finish. The next-generation formula is infused with natural comfort-enhancing ingredients, including Vitamin E and Sunflower Seed Wax so you can rock Everlasting matte colour that keeps lips feeling comfortable.

name: Summer Nights Iridescent Lip Luminizer Trio (Limited Edition)
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A limited-edition trio of creamy, shade-shifting lip luminisers laced with pearlescent colour for a sheer wash of island-inspired hues.

What it does:

Trick the light this summer with limited-edition Summer Daze and Summer Nights Iridescent Lip Luminizer Trios. These creamy, colour-flipping lip glosses feature a unique sheer formula that makes it possible to rock wild, island-inspired colours like never before. From bright, iridescent finishes (Summer Daze) to more dramatic, holographic sheens (Summer Nights), these wearable special effects look vivid yet apply sheer, giving lips a hint of colour with a megadose of pearlescent shimmer that all skin tones will love. Wear solo for a prismatic wash of colour, or apply over matte lipstick for endless new combinations.

What it includes:

  • Snake Skin 4ml
  • Mermaid Thighs 4ml
  • Vaycray 4ml

name: Summer Daze Iridescent Lip Luminizer Trio (Limited Edition)
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A limited-edition trio of creamy, shade-shifting lip luminisers laced with pearlescent colour for a sheer wash of island-inspired hues.

What it does:

Trick the light this summer with limited-edition Summer Daze and Summer Nights Iridescent Lip Luminizer Trios. These creamy, colour-flipping lip glosses feature a unique sheer formula that makes it possible to rock wild, island-inspired colours like never before. From bright, iridescent finishes (Summer Daze) to more dramatic, holographic sheens (Summer Nights), these wearable special effects look vivid yet apply sheer, giving lips a hint of colour with a megadose of pearlescent shimmer that all skin tones will love. Wear solo for a prismatic wash of colour, or apply over matte lipstick for endless new combinations.

What it includes:

  • Single 4ml
  • Bilingual 4ml
  • Ready To Mingle 4ml

name: Lip2Cheek Tint
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A multitasking cream colour for lips and cheeks.

What it does:

This unique formula hydrates and protects with abundant mineral colour, creating a beautiful, natural finish on both lips and cheeks. From youthful sheers to more intensely coloured stains, each shade is formulated with nourishing organic ingredients and raw mineral pigments.

name: Vice Lipstick
description:
What it is:

What it is:

An innovative lip formula now in an array of shades and finishes in a sleek, faceted case.

What it does:

Get unbelievable colour laydown in just one swipe of Vice Lipstick. It features an array of addictive shades and six indulgent finishes—including 20 shades that are Sephora exclusives—ranging from bold brights to dark hues to versatile neutrals. Each shade applies smoothly without dragging or skipping, hugs lips, and feels ultra-comfortable. Urban Decay’s proprietary Pigment Infusion System™ give each shade a super-creamy texture, rich payout, and superior colour dispersion. The ultra-nourishing formula is packed with a butter blend that comforts, hydrates, and enhances to leave lips soft and conditioned, never dry. Aloe vera, jojoba, avocado, and babassu oils nourish and soften lips. Illipe butter, derived from Malaysian illipe trees, provides long-lasting moisture, while vitamins C and E deliver a hint of antioxidants.

name: Punch Pop! Lip Color
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Liquid lip colour with a shine finish.

What it does:

Saturate your lips in juicy colour with Punch Pop! From Benefit Cosmetics. The creamy lip colour glides on easily, builds intensity with every layer, and dries to a smooth, non-sticky shine. Made with vitamin E, the cushiony formula helps to soften lips as you wear it to keep your pop of colour looking fresh.

name: Lip Whip Liquid Lipstick
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A jewel-shine metallic liquid lipstick with incredible staying power.

What it does:

Get in on the metallic lip trend with a Metallic Lip Whip that feels as lightweight, won’t smudge, and is waterproof. Each highly pigmented shade coats the lips in shimmer without feeling dry or heavy. From the first light of sunrise to a night sky full of star, these metallic shades stay put with a single application. A real treat for your lips, the lightweight formula goes on wet then dries to a smooth, glittering finish. The range of shades, from light and whimsical to show-stopping and saturated, are perfect worn alone or layered as a topcoat over lipstick.

name: Pure Color Envy Sculpting Lipstick by Violette (Limited Edition)
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A creamy lipstick that adds envious colour to create an irrestistibly luscious, ripe lip.

Poppy Sauvage, the New Collection by Violette. Influencer, Makeup Artist and Estée Lauder Global Beauty Director.

What it does:

This lipstick has colour with the power to transform your lips, even you entire look. Poppy Sauvage is a new collection by Violette, Influencer, Makeup Artist and Estée Lauder Global Beauty Director. Violette has a painterly eye for colour, which you can see in the collection’s sumptuous colour choices and the strokes of vermillion that adorn the packaging.

name: Lip Color Shine
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A lipstick that provides a gleaming finish in harmonising shades that complement a range of skin tones.

What it does:

Lip colour Shine is formulated with the same rare and exotic ingredients as the iconic, Tom Ford Lip colour: soja seed extract, brazilian murumuru butter, and chamomilla flower oil. This lipstick conditions, moisturises, and delivers a veil of long-wearing colour with a lustrous, high-shine finish.

name: Sprinkles Glitter
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A pot of eye-popping glitter.

What it does:

You’ve reached your pot of gold at the end of the rainbow! Beauty Bakerie Sprinkles will give your eyes or lips that wow factor you’re looking. From head-turning gold to oh-so-sweet violet, each high-impact shade add just the right amount of glitter to your look whether coating the lips to make a statement or lining the eyes for a can’t-miss twinkle.

name: Luscious Lip
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A rose-infused mask and creamy balm set for healthy, hydrated, and luscious lips.

What it does:

Get luscious, kissable lips with a mask and balm duo designed hydrate and soothe lips continuously. Infused with soothing rose extract, the sheet masks replenishes lost nutrients and essential moisture in as little as 15 minutes. Kiss Me Balm features a creamy, comfortable formula to provide lip care while adding subtle colour and an addictive scent. The dome-shaped applicator makes it easy to wear and reapply for moisturised lips all day long.

What it includes:

  • Lip Mask Rose
  • Kiss Me Balm in Candy Apple.

name: L'Absolu Rouge
description:
What it is:

What it is:

An ultra-luxurious, hydrating lip colour with a comfortable feel and all-day wear in an elegant range of shades and three finishes: sheer, cream, and matte.

What it does:

Lancôme’s L’ABSOLU ROUGE features the same amazing formula, now in a sleek, new click-to-close pack. Envelope your lips in rich, satiny colour with this deeply replenishing lipstick. Infused with moisture-boosting Pro-Xylane™, the formula imparts high-colour payoff without dryness, leaving lips moist, soft, and comfortable for up to eight hours. It’s enriched with antioxidant-rich vitamin E to help keep lips safe from environmental aggressors so that they look and feel healthier day after day. Available in an array of nudes to plums to bright reds—its stay-true colour won’t feather, flake, or fade. It’s enriched with Satin colour™ Complex to ensure an even deposit of colour upon application.

What else you need to know:

L'ABSOLU ROUGE in Rose was the 2015 Allure Best of Beauty Winner for Best Bright Lipstick.

name: Artist Rouge Lipstick
description:
What it is:

What it is:

ARTIST ROUGE LIPSTICK features an innovative high-precision bullet that guarantees easy application and targeted bold, vivid coverage. Discover the show-stopping colour, spectacular long-wear and outstanding comfort.

What it does:

Transform yourself with MAKE UP FOR EVER’s high-pigment formula with beautiful glide and single stroke coverage. A lipstick that was developed for the stage so you can reveal your artist within.

name: 3CE Matte Lip Crayon
description:
What it is:

What it is:

This powdery textured lip crayon gives a non-glossy look with a matte finish for a chic lip makeup.

What it does:

Enriched with natural oils to moisturize and nourish your lips, the lip crayon creates a creamy texture with a smooth application. Highyly pigmented and easy-blend formula saturates lips with super rich colour.

name: 3CE Lip Lacquer
description:
What it is:

What it is:

3CE's Lip Lacquer has a lipstick-like touch with press powder for soft cashmere lips.

What it does:

This lip-hugging cashmere gel based texture feels creamy when being applied while leaving a soft and matte finish. You'll have non-sticky lips with long-lasting application while have a moisturized and light feeling.

name: Per-fekt Lip Hint of Tint
description:
What it is:

What it is:

This moisturizing, wax free, sheer lip gel helps restore fullness and natural colour to the lips.

What it does:

Hyaluronic Microspheres and Jojoba hydrate and help smooth away the appearance of fine lines and chapped, dry lips. Spearmint adds a slight cooling sensation, great taste and helps breath feel fresh. This buildable gel can be worn alone or layer with your favorite lipstick leaving luscious, kissable lips in just one simple glide. One shade fits all with smart colour technology, creating a personalized shade just for you.

What else you need to know:

  • Formulated WITHOUT: Parabens
  • Wax-free
  • Contains: Hyaluronic acid, Jojoba and spearmint

name: Hyaluronic Sheer Rouge
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A lip-softening gloss loaded with hydrating colour.

What it does:

Gone are the days of choosing between stunning colour and lip-saving hydration. This glossy lipstick gives you plenty of both, thanks to its high concentration of hyaluronic acid which helps attract and retain moisture. Get softer, smoother, plumper lips and UV protection with each swipe of pigment.

name: Lip Color
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Saturate your lips with the creamy, high-pigment formulas of these matte lipsticks, no re-touching require.

What it does:

  • Just one coat leave vivid, matte colour and velvety texture that blends seamlessly for graduated artistry
  • Stays put all day

name: Lip Pigment
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A lip pigment that saturate your lips in vivid, high-impact colour.

What it does:

  • These 3 Concept Eyes Lip Pigments can be worn alone, mixed together or mixed with powders to create a customized blush or eyeshadow!
  • Just one drop is all you need for smooth, even, punchy colour.

name: Rouge Cream Lipstick
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A hydrating lipstick that creates full lips with intense colour.

What it does:

A revamp of the iconic Sephora Lip Attitude Chic, this new hydrating formula provides improved coverage and is rich with pigment. The creamy texture softly glazes your lips, imparting just the right amount of colour and sheen.

What else you need to know:

This product is not tested on animals.

name: Rouge Shine Lipstick
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Achieve an iridescent glow on your lips with this Rough Shine Lipstick

What it does:

This lipstick delivers a sheer finish. Its nourishing formula leaves your lips smooth and radiant for long hours. Its precise design enables you to create a well-defined lip appearance.

What else you need to know:

  • High shine version of Sephora Rouge Lipstick
  • Formulated with 3D shimmer particles for extreme shine
  • Contains shea butter for added radiance

name: Le Marc Lip Creme Lipstick
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A rich, creamy lipstick that redefines luxury with instant indulgent colour while providing 10 hours of wear.

What it does:

Indulge lips with a colour-rich, creamy lipstick in a sleek black case. In just one sensual swipe, Le Marc Lip Crème Lipstick delivers indulgent colour that lasts all day long. The unprecedented payoff comes from concentrated colour-boosting pigments that are triple-milled and enriched with hydrating ingredients—imparting ultimate long-lasting colour and moisture. Your lips will feel instantly plumped and nourished from powerful peptides, antioxidant-rich seaberry, and natural humectants, including meranti and cocoa butter. Its subtle vanilla taste and scent mimic a decadent dessert. Just snap the case shut and hear a satisfying click, which Marc Jacobs describes as "the sound of luxury."

name: Enamored Hi-Shine Lip Lacquer Lipgloss
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A high-shine lip gloss in covetable shades with lasting brilliance.

What it does:

Enamored Hi-Shine Lip Lacquer lipgloss delivers maximum colour and brilliance with its unique Triple Shine Complex, a blend of high-performance ingredients that provide unstoppable wear and shine like '30 coats of lacquer.' The brilliant shine contributes to an optical plumping look. Enamored feels cushiony on the lips, never sticky. This mint-scented lip gloss collection features a profusion of creamy pinks, shimmering lavenders and iridescent brights that give lips a lush look with lasting colour and unbelievable shine.

What else you need to know:

  • The shade names are inspired by Marc Jacobs's favorite music.
  • This product is a two-time Allure Best of Beauty award winner.
  • This product is formulated without parabens, sulfates and phthalates.

name: Kissin' Up Lip Gloss Set
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Bring out the mistletoe and pucker up for endless lip colour options!

What it does:

The Kissin’ Up Lip Gloss Set includes 18 shades in a range of finishes that deliver stunning sheer-to-full coverage. Mix and match different shades and finishes to contour lips or create custom looks.

What it includes:

  • Colours include (4 ml each): Iridescent Ice, Bronze Bow, Shimmering Coral, Festive Pink, Flushed Fuchsia, Sheer Lilac, Holly Red, Berry Jam, Crystal, Burgundy, Cinnamon Nude, Sugared Rose, Pink Satin, Candy Pink, Spiced Orange, Juicy Pink, Soft Red and Holiday Berry.

name: They’re Real! Double The Lip Lipstick & Liner
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A lip liner and lipstick in one with a custom applicator for intense volume and dimension.

What it does:

Get fuller-looking lips in one easy stroke with They're Real! Double the Lip. This Dual-performing liner and lipstick features a custom teardrop tip that grabs and defines your lip line and fills in lips with complementing colour for the appearance of volume and dimension. The semi-matte lipstick comes in neutral to bright shades for visibly fuller, sexier lips.

name: Burberry Kisses Gloss
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A lightweight, moisturising lip gloss with a high-shine finish.

What it does:

Turn up the shine to mirror-like intensity with Burberry Beauty Kisses Lip Gloss. Inspired by delicate Burberry fabrics and reflective mirror and patent finishes, it glides across the lips for a fuller-looking, blossoming effect. Stick with a subtle, dewy veil of colour or build up layers to create a wet-look result.

name: Lip Definer
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A high-pigment, ultracreamy, versatile lip liner with a sharpener.

What it does:

Perfectly define lip colour with this super creamy, sensorial lip pencil. It contours lips with its balance of rich texture, highly-pigmented colour, structure, and precision. Apply the non-drying formula as a liner, as an allover base to emphasize lipstick colour, or use it alone as a lip colour. With shades that perfectly complement the Burberry lipstick collection, it’s perfect for achieving a lasting, refined lip look.

What else you need to know:

  • Multi-use: Base, definer, lip colour
  • Creamy soft texture

name: Artist Natural Lipstick
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Enriched with nourishing properties, Rouge Artist Natural keeps lips hydrated for eight hours after application.

What it does:

Its incredibly smooth texture glides on effortlessly for ultimate comfort while also leaving the lips supple and moisturized. Formulated with mother-of-pearl and colourful pigments, Rouge Artist Natural's translucent shine adds a natural sheen to the lips.

name: theBalm Girls Lipsticks
description:
What it is:

What it is:

In what seems to look like an actual bullet, albeit the larger than normal size, is the secret to that sleek and vibrant pucker. theBalm Girls lipstick collection offers rich pigment and lasting wear for that dramatic look you're aiming for. Be it a natural day look or for an evening out with the ladies, this trusted makeup companion will astound you.

What it does:

  • Rich in pigment and lip conditioners which moisturizes and give lasting wear.

  • Soft creamy texture glides smoothly to provide great coverage.

  • Comes in six different shades that give variety and versatility to any look.

name: Plumprageous Gloss Lip Plumper Treatment
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A clear lip gloss with instant plumping action, creating visibly fuller lips.

What it does:

PLUMPRAGEOUS™ Gloss Lip Treatment instantly gives lips a plumped appearance. It’s formulated with a triple plumping action that includes immediate, high potency botanical plumping actives. Powered by an enriched pro-lipid complex, which supports your lips long-term enhancement, the super-smooth, clear gloss is non-sticky and creates noticeably fuller-looking lips. Wear it alone or on top of any lip colour for a sexy lip look.

name: La Creme Lipstick
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A powerful lipstick that delivers intense pigment and lip-conditioning benefits.

What it does:

Rich and creamy colour meets intense moisture and strengthening benefits in this cult-obsessed lipstick by Too Faced. Indulge lips with luxurious pigment and hydration with an infusion of white lotus flower extract that hydrates, soothes, and protect, plus power peptides that can stimulate collagen. With four essential colour ranges—nudes, spices, pinks, and reds—it’s impossible to pick just one.

name: Aqua Lip Waterproof Pencil
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Have pretty lips that don’t smudge or fade with this highly-pigmented waterproof lip liner.

What it does:

Part of MAKE UP FOR EVER’s Aqua collection of lip and eye colours created for the Parisian Aquatic Ballet, it’s no surprise that this liner is dependable and long-wearing. Shape lips and define them to perfection!

name: Tarteist Creamy Matte Lip Paint
description:
What it is:

What it is:

An ultra-pigmented, lightweight liquid lipstick in an array of long-wearing, everyday shades.

What it does:

Paint on pigment to create a tarteist™ lip masterpiece with this creamy matte liquid lipstick. Designed for styles ranging from modern minimalist to bold and dramatic, the high-definition, saturated formula starts as a traditional lipstick that’s been liquefied and concentrated, resulting in a luxurious, velvety texture with a sophisticated, matte finish. The full-coverage formula comes in an array of on-trend bold and everyday shades and features a paint brush wand with an ergonomically slanted, soft applicator so anyone can paint on precise pigment no matter your skill level.

name: Double Wear Stay-in-Place Lip Pencil
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Glides on effortlessly for precise definition with 12-hour staying power.

What it does:

Lightweight, creamy colour helps extend the wear of lipstick without feathering or bleeding.

Flip the pencil around and use the integrated lip brush to apply your lipstick or gloss for brilliantly defined colour and shine.

name: KissKiss - Shaping Cream Lip Colour (Limited Edition)
description:
What it is:

What it is:

KissKiss Shaping Cream Lip colour is an iconic Guerlain lipstick enriched with plumping hyaluronic acid spheres to help your pout regain its fullness and softness.

What it does:

Added commiphora oil smoothes while mango butter hydrates and added notes of vanilla and violet linger with a delicate scent. The satin-finish colour comes packaged in a sleek sculptural tube case that's a work of art in its own right.

name: La Petite Robe Noire - Deliciously Shiny Lip Colour
description:
What it is:

What it is:

La Petite Robe Noire Deliciously Shiny Lip Colour’s innovative texture reveals lips’ natural radiance while leaving them supple and smooth.

What it does:

Its lightweight formula delivers buildable coverage, thanks to its thin film: one layer to offer a glimpse of the sensual texture of the lips, and additional layers that create a dense and sophisticated finish. A blend of fine oils and a selection of “POP” pigments coated in a specific shine-boosting resin coat lips with an ultra-shiny finish for luminous colour.

What else you need to know:

  • Lightweight, buildable coverage.
  • High-shine finish.
  • Delicately flavored and fragranced.

name: Pop Lip Colour + Primer
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Luxurious yet weightless formula merges bold, saturated colour with a smoothing primer. Glides on effortlessly to a modern-velvet finish.

What it does:

Glides on effortlessly to a modern-velvet finish. Colour stays true, keeps lips comfortably moisturized for 8 hours. Allergy Tested. 100% Fragrance Free.

What else you need to know:

  • Striking colour upon application
  • Velvety finish
  • Moisturises lips for up to eight hours
  • Allergy-tested and safe to use
  • 100% Fragrance-free

name: Pop Glaze Sheer Lip Colour + Primer
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Smooth on a pretty pop of bold, yet see-through colour and primer with one coat.

What it does:

The luxurious and weightless formula with built-in primer glides on effortlessly and stays in place all day. Lips are left gorgeously tinted and comfortably moisturized instantly and over time.

What else you need to know:

  • 8-hour wear.
  • Formulated without formaldehyde.

name: CORALista Ultra Plush
description:
What it is:

What it is:

The plush gloss glides on extra smoothly and feels silky and luxurious on your lips.

What it does:

It contains a non-sticky formula which will not leave your lips feeling gummy. Dallas is a sheer coral shade which can be worn alone or mixed and matched with other colours.

What else you need to know:

  • Custom applicator enables easy application
  • Non-sticky and non-drying
  • Ultra plush texture

name: Rockateur Ultra Plush
description:
What it is:

What it is:

This gloss glides on extra smoothly and feels silky and luxurious on your lips. It contains a non-sticky formula which will not leave your lips feeling gummy. Rockateur is a sheer rose gold which can be worn alone or mixed and matched with other colours.

What it does:

It contains a non-sticky formula which will not leave your lips feeling gummy. Sugarbomb is a shimmering pink-nude which can be worn alone or mixed and matched with other colours.

What else you need to know:

  • Custom applicator enables easy application
  • Non-sticky and non-drying
  • Ultra plush texture

name: Pure Color Envy Hi-Lustre Light Sculpting Lipstick
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Covetable lip-sculpting colour and shine.

What it does:

Driven by desire, Esteé Lauder has created an irresistible line of Pure colour Envy Sculpting Lipsticks that saturate lips with lustrous colour and brilliant shine. Discover lip-shaping volume and definition with the bullet-shaped tip designed to perfectly follow every curve of your lip. The highly pigmented, medium-coverage formula transforms lips for up to six hours of curvaceous wear. Sculpt your lips with light.

name: Lippie Lingerie Matte Tint
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Slip into something comfortable with this smooth, matte lip tint in natural-looking shades.

What it does:

The buildable, full-coverage formula features a luscious, lip-loving™ blend of mango seed, cupuacu, and murumuru butters to help firm, hydrate, and protect lips as the twist-up tint glides on like a velvety balm. The non-drying, super-soft formula features a range of soft and deep-toned nudes to take your look from subtle to show-stopping.

name: Always Sharp Lip Liner
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A long-wearing, water-resistant lip liner that self-sharpens every time you twist off the cap.

What it does:

Give your lip the ultimate lip look with this lip liner that lasts. These lip liners feature tiny built-in sharpeners in the tip of the cap, so that they conveniently self-sharpen every time you twist off the cap. Enhance the shape of lips with this precise tip that can accentuate your cupid’s bow for fullness, or line your inside edges for a slimming effect. The colour-matched sculpting lets you match to an array of lip colours, while the water-resistant formula ensures that the lip liner does not smudge, feather, or bleed.

name: Be Legendary Lipstick
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A pigment-loaded lipstick that glides on rich, vibrant colour in just one swipe.

What it does:

Be Legendary Lipstick saturates your lips with show-stopping colour while softening and protecting them with shea butter and vitamins C and E. This lipstick stays colour-true in photographs and feels lightweight yet lush on lips.

name: Always On Liquid Lipstick
description:
What it is:

What it is:

An eight-hour wear, liquid-matte lipstick with a featherweight, comfortable formula that stays put and keeps colour looking as fresh and flawless as the first swipe.

What it does:

Perfected on-set in Smashbox’s L.A. photo studio, Always On Liquid Lipstick leaves lips with ultra-lightweight, but bold colour. This liquid-matte formula is infused with the lip-smoothing Smashbox Primer Oil complex for suede-soft lip colour in an array of gorgeous, highly pigmented shades. The precision tip applicator lines and fills with one swipe of the no-drop reservoir, while Advanced Polymer Technology makes lip colour stay put and look fresh and flawless for up to eight hours for smudge-proof, budge-proof, and non-feathering, carefree wear.

name: Insta-Matte Lipstick Transformer
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A gel that transforms any cream lipstick to a velvety-matte finish.

What it does:

Instantly change your favourite cream lipstick to matte with Insta-Matte Lipstick Transformer. Created on set to minimise the number of lipsticks Smashbox’s pro artists carried in their kits, this non-chalky gel mattifies any cream lipstick formula into a velvety one, improving its wear without feathering. Its portable tube is perfect for giving your lips a makeover wherever you go.

What else you need to know:

  • Allure Best of Beauty award winner
  • Not tested on animals
  • Vegan
  • Ingredients are subject to change​. Refer​ ​to​ ​the​ ​product packaging

name: Chachatint Cheek & Lip Stain
description:
What it is:

What it is:

This mango-tinted stain delivers a tropical coral hue. Its smudge-proof formula lasts from morning to night.

What it does:

It blends quickly with just your fingertips, delivering a fuss-free process without the help of additional applicators. Its buildable texture also allows you to layer on for an extra delicious colour.

name: They’re Real! Double The Lip Mini
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A mini version of Benefit Cosmetic's lip liner and lipstick in one with a custom applicator for intense volume and dimension.

What it does:

Get fuller-looking lips in one easy stroke with They’re Real! Double the Lip. This Dual-performing liner and lipstick features a custom teardrop tip that grabs and defines your lip line and fills in lips with complementing colour for the appearance of volume and dimension. The semi-matte lipstick comes in neutral to bright shades for visibly fuller, sexier lips.

name: Sun-body Loves You
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A very merry box filled with two favorites for year-round, all-around sun protection.

What it does:

Safeguard your skin from the sun’s harmful rays with all-over sport sunscreen and nourishing lip balm. The best-selling sunscreen by VMV Hypoallergenic is a powerful protector, yet lightweight and comfortable even in extreme outdoor conditions. The moisturising lip balm soothes dry, chapped lips while also protecting from harmful sun rays.

What it includes:

  • Armada Sport 50+ SPF 85g
  • Armada Moisturising Protective Lip Balm 60+ SPF 10g

What else you need to know:

  • VMV Hypoallergenics is committed to providing you with the safest and most effective skincare and cosmetics on the planet. That’s why they rely on countless studies, medical journals and conventions to grade products and bring you only the proven best.
  • Both sunscreen and lip balm are formulated without fragrance, dye, phthalates, parabens and preservatives.

name: Rouge G Customizable Lipstick Refill (Step 1)
description:
What it is:

What it is:

The refill for Guerlain’s first custom lipstick with a double mirror – a primer-plumper, liner and lipstick in one. Simply choose your shade and case to create your own lipstick.

What it does:

Guerlain has sealed intense colour and luscious lip care into a jewel formula. Enriched with plant-based polymers and sylver microcrystals with a reflective power, this exceptional formula beautifully enhances lips, cloaking them in intense and luminous long-lasting colour. Jojoba and mango butter help to nourish lips, offering them instant and lasting comfort. Hyaluronic acid and gugul resin help to smooth and plump up lips.

What it includes:

This product is a lipstick only and does not come with a portable case. Please go to Rouge G Customizable Lipstick Case (Step 2) page to find out your case.

name: Ultra HD Lip Booster
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A hydra-plumping serum to revive lips.

What it does:

A pro secret used to boost and prepare tired lips on sets, this hydra-plumping serum hydrates and smoothes, adding fullness and comfort. Wear alone for naturally healthy-looking lips, or use as hydra-plumping mask before lipstick application, wiping off any excess before applying colour.

name: 2 to Gogo! Gogo Tint Cheek & Lip Stain Set (Limited Edition)
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Bright cherry tinted cheek and lip tints.

What it does:

Trend alert: cherry red lips! Gogo wild for this duo, which includes a full-size and FREE mini. This see-through bright cherry red lip and cheek stain is vibrant, juicy and flatters all skin tones. It’s smudge-proof, kiss-proof and pops till you drop...you gogo girl!

What it includes:

Gogotint full-size and FREE mini Full size - 10 ML Mini size - 4 ML

name: Pure Matte Lips
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A liquid lipstick that delivers supple, colour-rich lips that last all day.

What it does:

Flaunt your lips with long-wearing ZOEVA Pure Matte Lips and drench your pout in eight exciting, infinitely matte shades from neutral to bold. Leaving a fine, lightweight layer that sets to an extremely matte finish, these liquid lipsticks are comfortable to wear and deliver supple, colour-rich lips that last all day, thanks to a transfer-free, ultra-flexible and creamy formula.

name: Graphic Lip Pencil
description:
What it is:

What it is:

An extra matte lip pencil for well-defined application and effortless, long-wearing lip definition with high opacity.

What it does:

From gentle shades to vivid colour statements, ZOEVA Graphic Lips offer everything your beauty heart desires. Sharply define and shape your lips with an ultra-precise and highly pigmented texture, and posh up your look with a choice of extra matte shades from soft rosé to deep plum. These wooden lip liners allow for clean, well-defined application and effortless, long-wearing lip definition with high opacity.

name: Tarteist Quick Dry Matte Lip Paint (Limited Edition)
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A quick-dry, full-coverage, transfer-proof liquid lipstick.

What it does:

Create full-coverage, opaque lip looks with this lightweight, liquid-to-matte lip paint. It dries down instantly so that colour does not transfer, and the comfort flex formula means it moves with your lips without drying out, cracking, or feathering. With the easy applicator wand, you can line and shade lips with high-impact, opaque matte colour in a wide array of nude and bold shades—powered by concentrated mineral pigments for all-day vibrancy and comfortable wear.

name: Rainforest Of The Sea Color Splash Hydrating Creamy Lipstick
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A long-wearing and moisture-rich, full-coverage lipstick in an array of creamy shades.

What it does:

Discover long-wearing lip colour powered by water with this full-coverage, hydrating lipstick. The ultra-creamy formula pairs intense pigments and buttery-smooth conditioners for comfortable colour that locks in place without feathering or bleeding. Each sea-inspired shade is infused with regenerative lip-quenchers and tarte’s antioxidant Rainforest of the Sea™ complex to help smooth the look of lip lines.

name: Hydrate And Glow Beauty Getaway Set (Limited Edition)
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A four-piece set of vegan beauty essentials, including an eyeshadow palette, lipstick and skincare, all infused with antioxidant-rich algae and other marine extracts to make skin look fresh, radiant and youthful.

What it does:

These beauty essentials help firm, hydrate and illuminate skin with antioxidant-rich algae. After moisturising with a drink of H2O, add light to your lids with the eight shades of the eyeshadow palette. Add a universally flattering pop of colour with the lipstick and lock the whole look in place for 12 hours with the 4-in-1 setting mist.

name: Color Splash Cocktail Lipstick Duo
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Two pint-sized, creamy, long-wearing vegan lipsticks perfect for your next tropical getaway.

What it does:

These lipsticks slick onto the lips with a buttery, rich texture and full-coverage pigment that lasts for 12 hours without feathering. Antioxidant-rich algae and other marine extracts help firm, restore fullness and smoothen the look of the lip lines.

name: H2O Gloss
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A water-based lip gloss packed with ocean-sourced nutrients in holographic, metallic, cream and pearlescent finishes and an intense, super-lacquered shine.

What it does:

This super-shine lip gloss pampers the lips while lacquering them with nourishing pigment and a glassy shine, making them look more luscious. Antioxidant-rich marine plant extracts help smooth away lip lines for a fuller and plumper appearance.

name: Tarteist Holographic Lip Gloss (Limited Edition)
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A vegan, iridescent, shimmering lip gloss that creates a magical mermaid glow with shade-shifting pigments.

What it does:

This non-sticky, high-shine gloss acts as a holographic lip-transforming top coat by changing colours with every flash of light, whether you wear it on its own or over your favourite lipstick. It lacquers and conditions the lips for comfortable wear.

name: Color Adapt Lip Balm
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A Sephora Collection lip balm that brings out your lip colour and hydrates them for 8 hours.

What it does:

This lip balm, available in Unique Pink and Unique Orange tints, reveals the beauty of lips by enhancing their natural colour and hydrating for 8 hours.

name: Matte Lip Primer
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A universal lip primer pencil that mattifies, sets and seals lipstick.

What it does:

Mattify your lipstick in a single stroke with this light and easy-to-apply lip primer pencil that won’t dry your lips out. It comes in a travel size so you can take it anywhere and everywhere you go.

name: Lip Lacquer Liquid Lipstick
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A liquid lipstick that delivers pure, unadulterated liquid lip colour in three decadent formulas.

What it does:

This new Tom Ford lipstick comes in three decadent formulas. Liquid Matte transforms the lips with full velvet-matte coverage, Liquid Metal mesmerises with a molten gleam, while Liquid Patent evokes the transfixing look of skintight vinyl. Drenched in long-wearing, stay-true colour, lips delight in lightweight, comfortable textures infused with smoothening moisturisers.

name: Versicolour Varnish Cream Lip Stain
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A glossy, high-coverage, hard-impact lip colour hybrid.

What it does:

This gloss-stain fusion of Versicolour ascends to the next level. Its watery-light formula glides on creamy and comfortable to impart long-wearing, saturated full coverage and an always-fresh wet finish. Its 12-hour, intense staining power promises to last far into the day and night.

What else you need to know:

  • Long-wearing, stay-true colour up to 12 hours
  • Long-lasting shine up to 4 hours
  • Not recommended for use on overly dry or sensitive lips

name: Melted Gold Liquified Gold Lip Gloss
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A high-glitter liquid foil lip gloss.

What it does:

Drench your lips in the sexy decadence of pure gold. Too Faced’s liquid foil formula takes on new life as a turned-up, epic, glitter-lipped moment when any light shines on it. It's buildable, easy-to-wear, and infused with real gold. Raise the gold bar by applying two to three layers of melted GOLD for maximum shine and decadence.

What else you need to know:

This product is formulated without parabens, sulfates, and phthalates.

name: Lip Shine
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A nourishing, natural lip gloss.

What it does:

Lip Shine combines nourishing oils and raw mineral pigments, resulting in an exotic formula that is visibly hydrating and provides the perfect wash of colour.

What else you need to know:

This product is formulated without parabens, sulfates, and phthalates. It is hypoallergenic, gluten-free, and noncomedogenic.

name: Everlasting Glimmer Veil
description:
What it is:

What it is:

An innovative, 24-hour wear liquid lipstick with a mesmerising, glimmer finish.

What it does:

Everlasting Glimmer Veil is the ultimate liquid lipstick to fuel your glimmer obsession. This breakthrough formula combines the same long wear, weightless innovation behind Everlasting Liquid Lipstick, with a multidimensional liquid-crystal finish. The result is the world’s very first 24-hour glimmer lipstick.

Kat Von D pushed the limits of performance to deliver 24-hour wear in a rich, glimmery, non-gritty formula that is so lightweight, it feels like nothing. Experience Gel Cushion Comfort—glimmer crystals that are coated in gel to ensure even application and effortless glide. This innovative liquid stain base is loaded with iridescent micro-pearls and reflective mirror-crystals for three layers of mesmerizing dimension.

Experience 3D effects with a swipe of the wand: Rock Everlasting Glimmer Veil on its own for a light-reflective finish, or layer it as a veil over Everlasting Liquid Lipstick for an ultra-high impact foiled lip look. Available in nine shade-shifting colors, including black, fuchsia, neon pink, and not one but two bold blues, this one-of-a-kind liquid lipstick catches the light with every movement.

name: Hi Fi Shine Ultra Cushion Lip Gloss
description:
What it is:

What it is:

An ultra-shiny lip gloss formula that glides on cushiony-soft.

What it does:

This ultra-shiny lip gloss glides on cushiony-soft, won’t feather and provides long-lasting wear that’s comfortable, not tacky. The wide range of colours spans from neutral to bright and includes three different effects—metallic, holographic and cream. Laced with vitamin E and peppermint oil, this hydrating formula nourishes, has a plumping effect, and comes in a yummy vanilla-mint flavour.

name: Lip Blossom Lipstick
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A lightweight lipstick available in 22 different shades of pink.

What it does:

Find your perfect pink with this silky-smooth, shiny lipstick, available in 22 shades. Its lightweight, moisturising formula is designed to melt into your lips at body temperature, spreading smoothly for close coverage, high translucence and less conspicuous chapped skin. Designed to look like a gorgeous bouquet and accented with a Swarovski rhinestone, even its packaging is beautiful!

name: Cream Lip Stain Metal
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Liquid lipsticks in metallic shades offering high coverage and no transfer of colour with a velvety soft and comfortable feel.

What it does:

Rediscover the Sephora Collection no-transfer Cream Lip Stains in trendy metallic shades that offer a long-lasting matte finish. Light-reflecting particles swathe your lips in dazzling, high-coverage colour that lasts. The creamy texture transforms to a velvety soft finish on application. Infused with avocado oil, these lip stains deliver the ultimate comfort. Discover an array of dazzling shades that pop, featuring quintessential nudes and brilliant reds to match your every whim. With the precision applicator, you get just the right amount to apply each and every time.

name: Cream Lip Stain
description:
What it is:

What it is:

This liquid lipstick acts as a lip stain with a unique texture that blends from creamy to silky.

What it does:

This must-have lip lipstick comes in bold colours and gives a matte finish that lasts for hours. Rediscover the Made In Sephora no-transfer Cream Lip Stain with its high-coverage formula and ultra-velvety texture. Infused with avocado oil, this lip stain delivers ultimate comfort, and it’s so easy to apply with its precision applicator that distributes just the right amount of Cream Lip Stain.

name: Baume De Rose Lip Scrub
description:
What it is:

What it is:

The iconic Baume de Rose lip interpreted in an ultra-gentle lip scrub that delicately smoothens, refines and beautifies the lips.

What it does:

Super-charged with Rose butter, Rose flower essential wax, Rose Hip oil and oil extracts of Black Rose and Pastel Rose, this lip scrub’s "sugary" rich balm formula leaves the lips and lip contour hydrated, nourished and more comfortable. Enriched with sugar micro-crystals, its mouth-watering texture melts on contact with the lips, providing an ultra-fine and sensorial exfoliating action.

name: Baume De Rose Lip Crayon
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A stylish version of the iconic Baume de Rose lip crayon in a convenient format.

What it does:

Deeply replenishing, this regenerating formula enriched with shea butter, Rose flower essential wax, ceramides and Vitamin E delivers hydrating, smoothing and comforting properties to sculpt the lips with a protective, glossy finish.

name: (P)outliner Longwear Lip Liner Pencil
description:
What it is:

What it is:

These gel-based, barely-there colours luxuriously line, define, and shape your lips, creating the perfect lasting canvas for lip colour.

What it does:

Designed to work seamlessly with the full spectrum of Le Marc and New Nudes shades, these liners complement every lip colour—no matter how light, bright, or bold. This cream gel formula glides on flawlessly for all-day wear.

What else you need to know:

  • Shades curated by famed makeup artist and Marc Jacobs Beauty consultant Diane Kendal
  • Formulated with collagen to help fill in lines and prevent bleeding

name: Lip Color
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A high-pigment, satin lipstick with the power to define a woman’s whole look—in shades that reflect Tom Ford’s modern ideal of essential makeup colours.

What it does:

Rare and exotic ingredients including soja seed extract, brazilian murumuru butter, and chamomilla flower oil come together to achieve Lip colour’s ultra-creamy texture and incredibly smooth application. Specially treated colour pigments are blended to deliver pure full-coverage colour with just the right balance of luminosity. With an alluring wardrobe of shades, each lipstick amplifies individuality with maximum, long-wearing impact.

name: Balm for Lips to Kiss (White Lotus)
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A delicious melt-in rosy balm that nourishes, moisturises and protects the lips.

What it does:

This balm leaves the lips soft, smooth and tempting. Nourished, smoothed, protected, your lips are wrapped in a shiny, lightly plumping veil, specially designed to attract attention. Infused with a subtle luscious scent, This lip balm makes your lips dangerously tempting. A fetish object to carry at all times, and whip out at will.

name: Greatest Hits Set (Online Exclusive)
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A set of Smashbox favourites containing a face primer, multipurpose lipstick, cheek colour, mascara and contour kit.

What it does:

This handy kit of Smashbox favourites has everything you need to create a radiant Los Angeles look. It includes a lightweight, oil-free face primer that smoothens skin, blurs pores and leaves a smooth, even finish; a multipurpose lip and cheek colour that build colour to a full-on sheen and natural flush; a fibre-rich mascara that increases lash volume by 104%; and an easy-to-use mini contour kit that teaches you how to sculpt and define your features with a silky, super-blendable set of bronzer, highlighter and contour powders.

What it includes:

  • A full-sized Original Photo Finish Smooth + Blur Primer
  • A full-sized L.A. Lights Blendable Lip & Cheek colour in Beverly Hills Blush
  • A mini Full Exposure Mascara
  • A mini Step-By-Step Contour Palette

name: Global Suncare UV Lip Color Splash
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A moisturising lip protector that gives just a wash of fresh, transparent colour whilst protecting the lips against UV rays with SPF 30.

What it does:

With its high transparency, this lip protector shows clear colour and shine. And when you are under light, the glow becomes brighter, and creates fresher-looking lips. This gentle formula includes moisturising safflower oil, and covers the lips with a dewy and light texture.

name: Ultra-Shine Lip Color
description:
What it is:

What it is:

An ultra-shine lip colour that is glossy, creamy and addictive.

What it does:

This innovative lip formula combines three lip musts: the easy, one-stroke application of a lipstick; the high-shine gleam of a lip gloss; and the rich emollient of a lip balm. Featuring lightweight silica powders for all day shine, the unique combination of esters and polymers ensure even, glossy application, while polyethylene wax gives a lightweight, conditioned feel.

name: Lip Color Sheer
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A sheer lip colour that delivers a lustrous sheen to complement sunkissed summer skin.

What it does:

Infused with a decadent blend of vitamins C and E and shea butter to saturate lips in moisture, Lip colour Sheer imbues lips with a healthy gleam. Its distinct, beveled, bullet is designed with a retro-chic, ivory- and gold-coloured TOM FORD case for unmistakable, signature style. Lip colour Sheer is part of the TOM FORD Soleil Collection, a sensuous series inspired by remote private islands where summer lasts all year and one day blends seamlessly into the next.

name: Le Rouge Mat Velvet Matte Lipcolor
description:
What it is:

What it is:

Le Rouge Mat Givenchy, an ultramatte lipstick, encased in genuine leather.

What it does:

As a true Couture accessory, Le Rouge Mat Givenchy dresses the lips in intense colours with a single stroke. Its velvety second-skin texture, highly concentrated in pigments, glides on the lips, ensuring an ultra-matte finish that remains comfortable for hours.

Discover these beautiful colours:
* 111 Brun Baroque – a chestnut brown with bold confidence
* 110 Nude Androgyne – a perfectly balanced nude with plenty of character
* 215 Neo-Nude – a soft pink for a natural lip effect
* 216 Rose Graphique – a petal colour that subtly emphasises the curves of the lips
* 329 Rouge Stiletto – without a doubt the star shade in the range - a confident and overwhelmingly feminine scarlet
* 330 Violine Rétro – a trendy raspberry for a timeless look
* 331 Pourpre Défilé – as deep as a velvet dress, a weapon of seduction

name: La Petite Robe Noire Colour'Ink
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A new-generation lip ink that lasts for 8 hours without transferring and remains comfortable all day long.

What it does:

This fearless liquid lipstick offers buildable intensity: one layer for lips that seem infused with colour; two or three layers for full coverage. Its secret? An ultra-fine, no-transfer texture for a weightless, bare-lip feel.

Lip Colour’Ink is available in 15 shades:
* #DARING SHADES: all the daring shades of black for a #TRENDY look (shade L162)
* #ESSENTIAL SHADES : must-haves shades for any beauty addict #STYLEGRAM (shade L121)
* #CRAZY SHADES: offbeat shades perfect for festivals #GET CRAZY (shade L141)
* #NUDE SHADES: for nude lips #ON FLEEK (shade L110)
* #LIP TRANSFORMER: La Petite Robe Noire gives her wardrobe a twist in a flash … just like her lipstick! The blue shade L101 #ADVENTUROUS lets you put an endless spin on the colours #15 SHADES OF BLUE

name: La Petite Robe Noire Colour'Ink Lip & Shine
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A smart product that lets you switch up your lipstick finish in a flash for an incredibly shiny result.

What it does:

Lip & Shine is one product with two uses. Use it as a hydrating base to leave lips supple and comfortable before applying your favourite lipstick. Then use it as a top coat for an ultra-shiny result that lasts for 8 hours without transferring and remains comfortable all day long.

name: La Petite Robe Noire Lipstick
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A lightweight lipstick with a deliciously shiny texture to dress up your style with colour.

What it does:

Its lightweight texture reveals the lips’ natural radiance, leaving them supple and comfortable. You can build coverage thanks to its thin film. Apply a single layer to offer a glimpse of the sensual texture of the lips, or several for a more dense and sophisticated finish. The formula is deliciously perfumed and delicately flavoured for an unforgettable taste on your lips. Its ultra-shiny finish and pure and luminous colours are thanks to a cocktail of fine oils and a selection of “POP” pigments coated in a specific shine-boosting resin. The formula improves the lips global quality over time: the more you use it, the more your bare lips become smooth, radiant and hydrated.

name: Be Legendary Liquid Pigment Lipstick
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A liquid lip formula that glides on the full coverage of a lipstick and the high shine of a gloss in a single coat.

What it does:

Be Legendary Liquid Lip delivers rich saturated colour with a vinyl finish in one coat. Its foolproof, precision tip applicator distributes product evenly and makes your lips appear more plump and full. Smashbox’s pro artists maxed out the shine in each formula with punched-up pigments and four levels of pearls that capture and reflect light from every angle. The result is a magic trick of light that makes your lips look fuller in any light and every pic. It feels soft on comfortable on lips—never gritty.

name: Poutmud Wet Lip Balm Treatment
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A powerful moisturising lip treatment for soft, hydrated, and kissable lips.

What it does:

POUTMUD™ Wet Balm is a moisture-rich lip balm that creates instantly softer, restored lips. The infusion of sweet almond oil, cocoa butter, murumuru butter, shea butter, tamanu oil, and babassu oil packs an ultra-hydrating punch, while kombucha extract boosts lip smoothness, radiance, and glow for perfectly luscious lips.

What else you need to know:

  • This product is formulated without parabens, sulfates, phthalates, and petroleum.

name: Plumprageous Metallic Lip Plumper Treatment
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A metallic lip plumper that visibly plumps, smooths, and enhances lips.

What it does:

Maximise the sexiness of any naked or barely-there makeup look. Get plumper-looking lips in a high-impact metallic finish perfect for all skin tones. It’s formulated with a triple plumping action that includes immediate, high potency botanical plumping actives.

name: Plumprageous Matte Lip Plumper Treatment
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A matte priming lip plumper that preps the lips for colour and creates visibly fuller-looking lips.

What it does:

PLUMPRAGEOUS™ Matte Lip Treatment is a two-in-one lip treatment that instantly and visibly plumps and primes. This innovative matte formula preps lips to create the perfect canvas for lip colour, ensuring smooth application and long-lasting wear every time. Wear it alone or under your favourite colour for a gorgeous lip look.

What else you need to know:

  • This product is formulated without parabens, sulfates, and phthalates.

name: Divine Studded Kiss Crème Lipstick (Limited Edition)
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A limited-edition Studded Kiss Crème Lipstick in a new nude shade inspired by Kat’s muse, Divine, the drag queen and entertainer.

What it does:

Every beauty queen knows the power of the perfect nude—neutral, volumising and insanely versatile. The Kat Von D x Divine Collection features the perfect honeyed nude in Kat’s new Studded Kiss Crème Lipstick formula—the creamiest, most cushiony and unbelievably pigmented lipstick to ever cross your lips.

Studded Kiss Crème Lipstick starts with a revolutionary new base formula that’s virtually weightless, crystal-clear and never dilutes pigment. One swipe and you’re done!

name: UD x Kristen Leanne Vice Lipstick
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A high payout lipstick that applies smoothly, hugs the lips and feels amazing.

What it does:

Want Kristen Leanne’s luscious lips? Well, now you can with this insanely high-pigmented range of Vice matte lipsticks in Kristen’s must-have shades: ultimate nude, berry and dark shades – all the colours Kristen takes with her everywhere to achieve any look.

Just one swipe provides an unbelievable laydown of colour thanks to Urban Decay’s proprietary Pigment Infusion System™, which gives the formula its super-creamy texture, rich payout and superior colour dispersion.

name: Signature Set
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A signature collection of RMS Beauty essentials curated by celebrity makeup artist Rose-Marie Swift.

What it does:

Available in two different colour palettes—Mod and Pop—this naturally perfect palette includes all shades necessary for an effortless, cool-girl look on the go. Pop on a hint of radiance with highlighter or bronzer and drench your skin in luminosity with a sensual luminiser. Enliven lips and cheeks with the multipurpose Lip2Cheek in either a modern coral pink or bright pink with cool undertones. Smooth and soften your lips and cuticles with the Lips & Skin Balm for maximum hydration.

name: Lip & Skin Balm
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A multi-use, natural balm for lips and dry skin.

What it does:

This multitasking balm can be used on lips, under eyes, and on cuticles to support, protect, and hydrate skin. Biologically active ingredients support natural skin function, softening fine lines and giving skin a smooth look.

What else you need to know:

This product is formulated without parabens, sulfates, and phthalates. It is hypoallergenic, gluten-free, and noncomedogenic.

name: Artist Hydrabloom Lip Balm
description:
What it is:

What it is:

A lip balm that keeps your lips moisturised for 24 hours.

What it does:

This universal lip balm hydrates and smoothens the lips, giving an instant made-to-measure flush of colour. Hyaluronic acid spheres smoothen and moisturise the lips while eosin allows the lip balm to adapt to any skin tone to give lips an instant blooming colour.

name: Step 1 Eye & Lip Equalizer Primer
description:
What it is:

What it is:

An unprecedented primer that guarantees flawless makeup wear for eyes and lips.

What it does:

With its triple action formula, this primer prepares the skin texture by minimising the appearance of fine wrinkles and imperfections to give a smooth base for makeup. It optimises every shade and traps the pigments for perfect makeup that holds up to 24 hours. Being colourless, it adapts to all skin tones.
